participate\/fleamarket\/.title: Flea Market
participate\/fleamarket\/.body:
This is a form for applying to be part of our Flea Market area. Having your own space at our festival you’re part of the family, having an active participation and also responsibility on bringing creativity, psychedelic culture, community based spirit and environmental acts.
Due to the very high demand, it’s mandatory to have previous experience as part of a festival market. We give preference for shops that sell hand made articles or designed by themselves with small productions, environmentally friendly products, natural materials, healing articles with a spiritual vision and creative ideas. It’s really important that your place is built with love, care, eco and beautiful structures.

Registrations will be until 31st March 2016 and we will analyze all the proposals until beginning of May 2016. Please try to fill the form with all details the most specific as possible: describe all the articles, your intentions, shop area, structure, articles photos or previous shops you had before and other information you may feel important to mention.

To confirm you’ve completed the form successfully, please verify that you receive a copy of your form at your inbox.

Thank you for your effort and for willing to join our magical Boom Festival 2016! It’s a pleasure to read your proposals.

Any doubt, contact fleamarket@boomfestival.org

Submission Deadline: 31st March 2016 - 23:59 GMT
Warning: All Stall Application Forms received after this date will not be considered.

participate\/food-vendors-chaishops\/.title: Food Vendors & Chaishops
participate\/food-vendors-chaishops\/.body:
This is a form for applying to be part of our Boom Festival, with your own food, drinks or/ and chai space. Having your own place at our festival you’re part of the family, having an active participation and also responsibility on bringing creativity, psychedelic culture, community based spirit and environmental acts.
Due to the very high demand, it’s mandatory to have previous experience as a food vendor in other festivals/ events. We require that all the vendors publish to the public the source of all the products that they offer, being required to use mostly fair trade, bio and organic. 

It’s really important that your place is built with love, care, eco and beautiful structures. The use of alternative energy and fair menu prices are also an important selection criteria. We want to offer food prices that ensure our Boomers eat well and in an affordable way during all the festival period.

Registrations will be until 31st March 2016 and final answers will be given by the end of April 2016. Then we will follow you up about all needed information, terms and conditions. Please try to fill the form with all details the most specific as possible: describe your vision, food menu, prices, structure and materials to be used, photos of proposed dishes, previous food or drink stalls you had before and other information you feel important to mention.

To confirm you’ve completed the form successfully, please verify that you receive a copy of your form at your inbox.

Thank you for your effort and for willing to join our magical Boom Festival 2016! It’s a pleasure to read your proposals.

Any doubt, contact restaurants@boomfestival.org

Submission Deadline: 31st March 2016 - 23:59 GMT
Warning: All Stall Application Forms received after this date will not be considered.

participate\/performance-street-performa.title: Street Performance
participate\/performance-street-performa.body:
[Versão Portuguesa em Baixo]

Dear Boomers!
 
Boom is a very real human manifestation which comes to life because of your diverse talent, creativity, fantasy and love. Every year we welcome the projects which you have submitted to us.

Long gone are the days when we received your CDs, DATs, books and photocopies filled with ideas. Ways of communicating have been transformed and nowadays your art comes to us via the website. 
However, we still love to receive your handwritten notebooks and drawings !
Not only does contemporary technology facilitate our communications with you, but each year we witness a growth in the number of people wishing to participate.

From November 2015 until February 29, 2016, we received approximately 1509 applications for music, art installations and a further 166 artistic projects. Alongside these were an amazing array of diverse proposals; 421 workshops, 117 painters, 216 therapists, and 247 proposals from performers.

Throughout all the various editions we’ve always included projects which came from your  applications in the official Boom program. 

Our multi-disciplined team has without exception listen to all your musical and creative offerings in addition to reading your individual questionnaires in order to know each artist and the human being behind the artist better.
 
The Boom team responsible for selecting the music applications are themselves musicians and,or DJs, all of whom work in music, its related areas and music production. 
Within the Arts team we have a dynamic array of visual artists and painters as well as art directors, and of course the same can be said for the Boom performance area with our creative team coming from the world of live performance and visual theatre, supported by seasoned professional artists and dancers. 
Our dedicated workshop team is made up of experienced practitioners, learned curators and specialised trainers all coming with years of practice and involvement in the areas of well being and healing.

We wish to thank you for your involvement and participation. Over the coming weeks we will continue to evaluate the applications with the same passion and dedication with which you have submitted your proposals.

It is nevertheless impossible to include everyone in the Boom 2016 program and those of you who are selected will be contacted soon or will have already been contacted. 
However, to all of you-the talented people that won’t be part of the final selection we wish to thank you for your passion and willingness of being part of the Boom Festival and we hope to see you in Boomland!
 
Thank you!
 
With Love and Gratitude
Yours Boom Team

 

[Versão Portuguesa]

Final das Candidaturas

Caros Boomers!
 
O Boom é uma manifestação humana que vem à vida com todo o vosso talento, criatividade, fantasia e amor. Anualmente abrimos o festival à vossa participação, aos projectos que nos enviam para que possam ser partilhados com os Boomers. Longe vão os tempos em que recebíamos caixas de CDs, DATs, livros e fotocópias com ideias; os tempos evoluem e actualmente a vossa arte chega até nós via website. Não apenas as tecnologias facilitam o nosso contacto, anualmente os números da vossa participação crescem!

Desde Novembro de 2015 até 29 de Fevereiro de 2016, recebemos cerca de 1509 candidaturas para música, 166 projetos de instalações artísticas, 421 propostas para workshops, 117 pintores, 216 terapeutas e 247 submissões para performances. 

Ao longo das várias edições incluímos sempre em todas as áreas do Boom projectos vindos das candidaturas. Para a celebração da Lua Cheia de 11 a 18 de Agosto de 2016, a nossa equipa multidisciplinar tem ouvido música, lido os vossos questionários para conhecermos melhor o ser humano para além da obra que é submetida na candidatura, sem excepção. 
As pessoas da Boom Team que fazem a selecção na música são músicos, DJs e elementos da produção ligados à música. Nas artes são artistas visuais, pintores, directores artísticos. Nas performances quem avalia são produtores de teatro, performers e dançarinos professsionais. E nos Workshops a nossa equipa de produtores, formadores, curadores de conhecimento, yoga e outras áreas de bem-estar dedicam uma grande atenção a tudo o que nos propõem.
 
Agradecemos-vos pelo envolvimento e participação, iremos continuar nas próximas semanas a avaliar tudo com a mesma dedicação com que nos submeteram as vossas propostas!

É impossível conseguirmos incluir todas as pessoas no programa do Boom 2016, quem for convidado será contactado; quem não puder fazer parte, agradecemos neste momento a vossa criatividade e vontade de fazer parte do Boom – esperamos ver-vos na Boomland!
 
Obrigado!
 
Com Amor e Gratidão
A Vossa Boom Team

tickets\/boom-tickets-info\/.title: Boom 2016 Tickets Info
tickets\/boom-tickets-info\/.body:
Dear Boomer, we are grateful and honored to co-create Boom with you! The access to culture is a human right (article 27th of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights) and the creation of an alternative to the political, economic and social systems is a human imperative. That is our motto for the Pricing System.


We live in a moment in our collective history where rights and duties are forgotten for the sake of human progress aiming materialism, the fragmentation of social classes between those who have and those who don't (Financial Absolutism), and the exhortation of the human Ego, through the trap of social networks leading the neo-narcissism, the projection of the self in the virtual world or “Hollow-Me”.

It is in this context that Boom Festival 2016 takes place. Pricing for us is a social exercise: on the one hand economic (yes, economics is a social science, with its etymological root in "oikos", the house - the same root as ecology) and on other hand, social consciousness.

In economic terms the Boom must be a sustainable festival. It is an independent event without sponsors and based in Portugal, which means we have to deal with very high taxes. 13% of each ticket goes directly to the Portuguese State. Bars and restaurants revenue is taxed at 23%; a Boom Bus ticket has 6% tax. At the end of the year if there are profits, the State gets 23.5% - the Boom is not based in an offshore as many events throughout the world are. Another mandatory tax is 1% of the total income goes directly to the State. On a monthly basis, per long term worker, the Boom has to pay 24,75% of the wage to the State and 5% for free lancers. In parallel to all this we create this cultural and artistic manifestation that is the Boom Festival!

Our social consciousness is expressed in many ways: part of the income goes to charity (Boom Karuna Project). The profits are applied in Boomland (and especially in 2016 for its purchase). The running costs are in maintaining an international working team and projects such as the Being Gathering (former Be-In Gathering).

We also want to be an event that honors the human right to culture (with affordable prices for participants) but also that encourages the participation of each one of you to get more information and tools to raise awareness for the Great Transition (which means having a quality cultural program).

Thus, the 2016 Pricing is the result of a careful thinking process about the possibilities for Boomers and the need for being a sustainable and independent festival.

We have chosen to have less ticket phases compared with previous editions to allow you more time to acquire a ticket in each phase (there are three phases in 2016 and not four phases as in 2014). We don’t increase the highest price of the tickets (which remains at 180 €). We applied an average between the previous 3 ticket phases in ​​2014 (120€, 140€, 160€) to obtain an average for the current value of the first two stages in 2016 (130€, 150€).

Furthermore, tickets for Boom are limited. In spite of the growing popularity and positive perception about Boom, we are focused on keeping a familiar and cozy vibe, with quality and comfort. Boom is not about quantity. There are 33.333 tickets available for Boom 2016.
There are a limited number of tickets per phase. If tickets are Sold Out before the date of the end of the phase, the following Phase begins immediately. Never buy a ticket on auction websites such as Ebay, Olx and many others.

We believe that every Boomer is part of the Boom Team (just as every member of the Boom Team is first and foremost a Boomer!), an essential co-creator of the festival, a contributor to the manifestation of the Boom reality out of a shared field of infinite potential. By purchasing a Boom ticket, you will help serve the following purposes:
 

• Renting the Boomland (unfortunately Boom Festival doesn’t own it). It will help us raise funds to buy the Boomland (deadline is September 2016).

• Paying for materials to build Boom from scratch, over 150 ha of land: 4 music areas, the Being Fields and the Sacred Fire areas, Younger Dragon, the Liminal Village and the Visionary Art Museum, the Dance Temple as well as the Central Plaza restaurants and stage area, the Main Gate and Service Gate, dozens of art installatios, gardens, to name just a few.

• Paying the fees of 800 artists that will perform at Boom 2016.

• Payment of wages to 1200+ workers and food for those who build Boom and work in pre-production.

• Development of a world-class environmental program including: water, sanitation, energy, bio-construction, recycling, permaculture gardens, etc.

• Support the curatorship of the art installations and performance arts.

• Design and implementation of pre-production, production, post-production and the thousands of tasks that come with all of this.

• Building of showers, toilets, water pipes, electrical circuits and all the complex logistics involved in making the Boomland a pleasant and functional home for 30.000+ people.

• Building the caravan park, camping area and car park.

• And all the bigger or smaller details in between; all this to make sure all Boomers have the most unforgettable experience ever!!!

Note: Taking into account a daily estimate of the ticket price, the average price per day for First Phase ticket holders is €14; Second Phase ticket price works out at €17 per Boom-day, and third Phase at an average of €20 per Boom-day.

As usual we set the prices taking into account the different economic realities of each country. Having this in mind, beyond the Regular Prices, we will have Friendly Price tickets and a Guest Country.

 

REGULAR PRICE

Regular price tickets are set for people living in all European Union countries (except those mentioned below in the friendly price areas), Australia, Canada, Israel, New Zealand, USA, Oman, Qatar, United Arab Emirates.

Regular price tickets are available online at our website or at your local Boom ambassador.

 

FRIENDLY PRICE

We also have a Friendly Price for people in countries with a specific economic realities. The list of countries and regions is the following:

> Greece;
> Africa;
> Middle East, Asia and the Pacific, excluding Australia, Israel, Japan, New Zealand, Oman, Qatar and United Arab Emirates;
> Mexico, Caribbean, Central and South America;
> Central and Eastern Europe: Albania, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Bielorussia, Bosnia, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Estonia, Georgia, Hungary, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Macedonia, Montenegro, Poland, Republic of Moldova, Romania, Russia, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Tajikistan, Turkey, Turkmenistan, Ukraine, Uzbekistan.

Friendly price tickets are non-transferable and only available at your local Boom ambassador. To have access to this ticket, your local ambassador will require you to show proof of national residency.

About the End of the Social Price: The Social Pricing was a temporary measure established in 2012 and 2014 for European countries that were undergoing the financial speculation of capitalist institutions, rating agencies or the banks such as the IMF. The situation has been changing and the Social Price is no longer applied for countries such as Portugal, Ireland, Cyprus or Spain. The only country that is subject to these programs is Greece, therefore Greece will be included in the Friendly Price Ticket system. 

 

GUEST COUNTRY

As a tradition in every edition of Boom there is a guest country. We are delighted to welcome Japan as Boom’s 2016 guest country! 

Guest Country Ticket is available ONLY for Japanese nationals that are living in Japan! Japanese people are required to show their Boom ambassador proof of residency in Japan. 

Please contact your Japanese Ambassadors to register and be able to receive one of the Guest Country Tickets.

NOTE: Boom is a limited capacity event, Guest Country Tickets are limited to 500 people. 

 

BOOM AMBASSADORS

The Boom Festival family is all around the world. From India to Costa Rica, from Thailand to Belgium, Australia to Ireland... We have around 80 different Boom Ambassadors that represent the festival in more than 40 countries.

A Boom Festival Ambassador is someone or any organization that represents Boom Festival around the world. They can give you all the information you may need about the festival, sort out any question you may have and also sell Boom tickets.

They are the liaison between Boom HQ and the Boomers, helpful brothers and sisters that do an amazing job.

Our BOOM AMBASSADOR LIST is available HERE!

If you don't have a Boom Ambassador in your country, please contact the ambassador that's in the closest country to yours and he will help you in anything you may need.

Any extra information you need, please contact us to our email: ambassadors@boomfestival.org.

NOTE: Online Ticket sales are subject to an extra fee for Redunicre transaction charges

 

CHILDREN TICKETS

Children under 13 years of age are granted free entrance into the festival. Yet, considering the very high temperatures, loud noise and high evels of dust, we recommend parents not to bring children under 3 years of age!

All children under the age of 13 traveling to Boom Festival with their parents will have to be registered online. The registration procedure will be identical as for the purchase of an adult ticket and will have a cost of 1€. In cases when children get lost from their parents, our security teams will be able to find the parents of the child easily. Children registrations/tickets are available HERE

 

BOOM BUS

The Boom Bus is a charter bus service for a safer, more comfortable and sustainable Boom experience. It is part of our environmental program as a public transport project, aiming to decrease CO2 emissions. This service provides transport from Lisbon and Madrid directly to the festival and returns. There will also be a partnership for bus transport from some cities in France and Switzerland.

Bus tickets will be available from the 11th of November onwards.

More info about Boom Bus timetables and other info, check HERE.

 

If you have any questions please contact us at etickets@boomfestival.org 

or call +351 963 332 206

tickets\/boom-bus-info\/.title: Boom Bus Info
tickets\/boom-bus-info\/.body:
This service provides transport from Lisbon and Madrid Airports directly to the festival. In 2014 we transported more than 6.000 boomers and everybody had a great experience.

There are also connections from France, Switzerland and Belgium offered from our official partner. More info regarding departure cities, timetables and prices will be published in December.

Similarly to the last edition, the Boom Bus will enter into the Boom venue one day before the official gates opening: you’ll be able to choose the best place to camp and have some relaxing moments around the lake, enjoying the sculptural and unspoilt landscape of inland Portugal.

Besides all the comfort of travelling with our psy buses, our Bus ticket prices will remain the same during all phases of ticket sales. Check out our prices for round trips, departure places and timetables.

Boom Bus tickets can be bought online and at your local ambassador. Sales will start on the 11th November 2015 and finish on 11th of July 2016, so from that date onwards you can’t buy anymore bus tickets, only at the festival for bus journeys out of the festival once it is over.

BOOM BUS TICKET INFO

 

DEPARTURE PLACES AND TIMETABLE INFO

 

ONE WAY TICKETS

Online and at your local Ambassador you can only purchase return tickets (both ways).  At the festival you will be able to purchase one way tickets to Lisbon and Madrid Airports.

 

CHILDREN ON BOOM BUS

Baby Boomers up to 3 years old don’t need to get a bus ticket, as they can travel on the parents' lap. Children older than 3 must purchase a bus ticket, as they will use a seat. We will provide adapted seats for all children that are traveling on our psy buses.

In case of doubt contact us to our infoline +351 277 201 052 or send us an email to boombus@boomfestival.org.

tickets\/full-terms-conditions\/.title: Full Terms & Conditions
tickets\/full-terms-conditions\/.body:
1. Tickets are sold for the event by the cultural and environmental organization called Good Mood Ltd (the ‘Promoter’) subject to licence approval, the terms and conditions below, and the rules and regulations of the Boom Festival (the “Festival”), as displayed at the venue (the “Site”).

2. These terms & conditions contain important information, please read them carefully. The use of this ticket and entry onto the Site shall constitute an acceptance by the holder of these terms & conditions and imply an undertaking on the part of the holder to observe them. In the event of any breach of these terms & conditions, the Promoter reserves the right to cancel tickets, to refuse admission, to remove the holder or to confiscate offending articles, as the case may be, and in any case, to retain any monies paid for the relevant ticket.

3. Tickets cannot be transferred, re-sold, refunded or re-issued. If this ticket is re-sold or transferred for profit or commercial gain by anyone other than the Promoter or one of its authorized sub-agents, it will become void and the holder may be refused entry or removed from the Site.

4. No tickets may be used for competitions, promotions or hospitality packages without the prior written consent of the Promoter, and any ticket so used will become voidable and the holder may be refused entry or removed from the Site.

5. Tickets are sold subject to the Promoter’s right to alter or vary the performances and/or the Festival without being obliged to refund monies or exchange tickets.

6. Lost, stolen, damaged, destroyed or undelivered tickets cannot be replaced or refunded. There will be no admission without a valid ticket. When you receive your tickets, please check them carefully, as mistakes cannot always be rectified. Keep tickets in a safe place.

7. The Promoter reserves the right to refuse admission to the Festival. Stewards and security personnel will conduct searches of persons entering the Site to ensure the safety of the persons on Site.

8. Any person who fails to comply with instructions from a steward or other person acting for the Promoter or behave against the peaceful atmosphere we all want at Boom may be removed from the Site.

9. Admission to the Site is at the ticket holder’s own risk. The Promoter and Landowner will not be held responsible for loss or damage to property or persons whilst attending this event.

10. No bottles, cans, glass, containers, alcohol are allowed. Food, chairs (except for folding chairs), tables, or picnic equipment can only be brought onto the campsite – please help us minimizing the impact in the nature by not bringing too much camping gear and then leaving it behind. Glass bottles increase the risk of fire and are harmful for the nature if left behind, they are not allowed. Any of these items found will be confiscated. Water and non-alcoholic drinks in plastic bottles with unbroken seals up to 500ml are permitted in the festival area.

11. No illegal substances may be brought onto the Site.

12. Official merchandise, food, drink and general provisions will be available from authorised identified vendors within the Site. No trading shall be undertaken without the prior written consent of the Promoter, any offenders will have their property confiscated and will be removed from the Site.

13. Photographic, video or audio reproduction of Boom festival is prohibited.

14. Ticket holders consent to their inclusion in official newsletters or other communication, photographic, visual & audio recordings of the Festival as members of the audience.

15. No animals are allowed on-site, guide dogs for the blind excepted. There have been problems with lost dogs in the past, be aware that the sun, dehydration, noise and many people can increase the stress and health problems of our beloved pets. Due to this pets are not allowed at Boom.

16. The Boom is a space of freedom and no prejudice. It's a space for free spirits based on values such as peace, art, environment, celebration, culture, education and love. Please respect your brothers and sisters and the nature around you. Don’t engage in negative behaviors towards others. We Are One.


Force Majeure:

In the case of circumstances beyond normal control, such as war, civil or political unrest, actions and orders from the authorities, strikes, catastrophes, epidemics or other severe damages or highly unexpected factors the Promoter may cancel the Festival, and the amounts received will not be refunded.


WARNING:

IT IS POSSIBLE THAT EXPOSURE TO LOUD MUSIC MAY CAUSE DAMAGE TO HEARING. PLEASE BRING EAR PLUGS. Please be aware that strobe lighting may be used (even if we don’t like it!).

tickets\/boom-bus-terms-conditions\/.body:
1.CARRIAGE SERVICES

1.1 Our agreement to carry you:
We agree to carry you and your luggage on the journey permitted by your ticket, on and subject to these General Conditions of Carriage.

1.2 Your ticket and wristband:
Your ticket and wristband are a record of our agreement to carry you or to arrange for your carriage. Your ticket is our property, and shall be returned to us on request. A ticket and wristband are personal and non transferable.

1.3 Seat reservations:
All reservations are subject to availability of seats on the service for which you request a reservation and you will not be given a reservation if no seats are available on the service. A reservation of a seat does not guarantee you a particular seat on a bus.

2.PASSENGER RESPONSIBILITIES

2.1 You must make sure you are on the correct service:
You are responsible for making sure that you meet any service on which you are traveling at the relevant boarding point.

2.2 You should arrive at the boarding point at least 30 minutes before departure:
(a) Arrival : You should arrive at the boarding point for a service at least 30 minutes prior to the timetable departure time for that service.
(b) Effect of late arrival: We may give your seat to another passenger if you arrive later than the scheduled departure time, in which case you will be considered to have missed the service. We shall not be liable to you if you miss any service as a result of your late arrival, and shall not be obliged to hold up any service to wait for you, or to provide a seat on any other service, if you miss a service.

3.BOOM BUS RESPONSIBILITIES

3.1 Our obligation to carry you:
It is our obligation to carry you and your permitted luggage on the journey permitted by your reservation, on and subject to these General Conditions of Carriage.

3.2 We will not carry animals:
We will not carry dogs or any other animals.

4. LUGGAGE

4.1 Permitted Luggage: We will carry your luggage on and subject to these General Conditions of Carriage. You are allowed to take onto a service one or two medium sized suitcases or rucksacks (no more than 20kg per item, and one small piece of hand luggage).

4.2 Prohibited contents:
(a) Prohibited luggage: We are not obliged to carry any of the following items of luggage, and you may not bring them onto any bus: any weapons, drugs or solvents (other than medicines), live or dead animals, fish or insects or any items which in our opinion are unsafe or illegal.
(b) What happens if you take prohibited luggage: If you take any of these items onto any bus, we may remove them from the bus immediately on discovery, and leave them outside the bus, wherever they may be situated.

4.3 Identification of luggage: All luggage which is given into our custody should be clearly and appropriately labeled and include a contact telephone number where possible. We will not be obliged to carry any luggage that has not been labeled.

5. PASSENGER BEHAVIOUR

5.1 Required behaviour and prohibited behaviour:
You shall behave in a reasonable, sensible and lawful manner on a bus and at any station, comply with any request from a member of staff and you shall not: be abusive or threatening to any staff or any other person; or conduct yourself in a way which may endanger yourself, any bus or station or any person or property on board any bus or at any station; or behave in a manner which causes discomfort, inconvenience, damage or injury to other persons; or take onto any bus or into any station any alcoholic drinks or drugs (other than medicines) for the purpose of consuming them, or consume them on any bus or in any station, or consume or take any hot food onto the bus, such takeaway foods; or board any bus whilst under the influence of alcoholic drinks or drugs; or smoke.

5.2 Consequences of bad behaviour: If you fail to comply with any of the behaviour rules in Clause 5.1, or we have reason to believe you may continue any conduct in breach of those behaviour rules, we shall be entitled to restrain you, remove you from the bus, refuse you further carriage, cancel your ticket without refund, and take any other measures as we consider necessary to prevent continuation of such conduct.

6. GENERAL

6.1 By signing this General Conditions of Carriage document it is assumed that you have understood and accepted all of its content.

6.2 All Boom Bus ticket reservations are final and non refundable.

6.3 If you give up traveling in any leg of your journey with the Boom Bus by some unknown or know reason we will not be liable to refund you the ticket.


Force Majeure:

In the case of circumstances beyond normal control, such as war, civil or political unrest, actions and orders from the authorities, strikes, catastrophes, epidemics or other severe damages or highly unexpected factors the Promoter may cancel the Festival, and the monies received will not be refunded.

IT IS POSSIBLE THAT EXPOSURE TO LOUD MUSIC MAY CAUSE DAMAGE TO HEARING. PLEASE BE AWARE THAT STROBE LIGHTING MAY BE USED DURING THE FESTIVAL.

tickets\/faq\/.title: Tickets FAQ
tickets\/faq\/.body:
Boom 2016 Online Tickets Are Sold Out.

Read more HERE.


Boom Festival Ticket Shop Address: https://tickets.goodmood.org
 

How to register an account
Go to https://tickets.goodmood.org and click on: "Not registered yet? Sign up here".

How to login
Go to https://tickets.goodmood.org input your email and password and click "Sign in".

How to recover your password
Go to https://tickets.goodmood.org and click on: "Forgot your password? Click here". You will receive an email with a new account password.

How to get tickets (with or without Bus)
Go to menu "Items->Get tickets". Click "Get Boom 2016 Ticket Now"
Fill all the required details
Click "Next"
Choose options (only Bus. Tipis are sold out.) - for no Bus choose "None"
Click "Next"
Answer short questionnaire
Click "Add to basket" - your eticket will be added to the Shopping Cart
You will receive a warning: to finalize your order check your shopping cart. Click anywhere outside this box to dismiss it.
Repeat the process for each additional ticket you want to buy - they will be added to your shopping cart.
When you're ready to pay, just click the Shopping Cart icon and click "Go to basket"
A short summary with your tickets and values is displayed on your screen. Here you can delete mistaken tickets.
Click "Proceed to payment" - you'll be directed to the Redunicre payment page.
Fill your credit card details and click "Validate"
You will return to the Boom ticket shop.
Check your email for your eticket PDF and your receipt PDF.
Check in "Items->My tickets" for your tickets.

How to print your tickets (AKA send tickets to my email)
Go to menu "Items->My tickets". Click "Send to email". You will receive an email with your ticket PDF attached that you can print anywhere.
You can also bring your ticket PDF to the gates in your mobile (in fact you should - avoid wasting paper... and trees).
You can always come to this menu to send your ticket PDF to your email.

How to add services (Bus) to your ticket
Go to menu "Items->My tickets".
Select "Change/Add" on the required ticket.
Click "Next"
Choose service to add
Click "Save" - you'll be directed to the Redunicre payment page.
Fill your credit card details and click "Validate"
You will return to the Boom ticket shop.
Check your email for your eticket PDF and your receipt PDF.
Check in "Items->My tickets" for your tickets.

Get children tickets and services (bus). Parent/legal guardian of the child must have his Boom Festival ticket already.
Go to menu "Items->Get tickets". Click "Get Boom 2016 Ticket Now".
Fill all the required details.
Once you fill in the date of birth the system will "recognise" a child under 13 and you'll have 2 new options:
- Responsible name (select the ticket from the responsible for the child)
- emergency number
Click "Next"
Choose options (only Bus. Tipis are sold out.) - for no Bus choose "None"
Click "Next"
Answer short questionnaire
Click "Add to basket"
Your eticket will be added to the Shopping Cart
You will receive a warning: to finalize your order check your shopping cart. Click anywhere outside this box to dismiss it.
When you're ready to pay, just click the Shopping Cart icon and click "Go to basket"
The rest of the process is the same as buying a regular ticket

My credit card payment is not accepted
Only VISA or MasterCard credit cards are accepted.
Redunicre (our payment gateway) does not "Accept" or "Refuse" credit card transactions, Redunicre only acts as a communication gateway between the merchant and the issuing bank.
It is the issuing bank's responsibility any message that is transmitted, either it is accepted or refused.
There are a lot of reasons for payments being refused including Internet and/or overseas purchasing restrictions on your card, an incorrect password, incorrect expiry date or insufficient funds, etc. If you receive this error repeatedly we encourage you to contact the bank issuing your credit card in order to investigate and resolve the issue.
Customers who have a registered credit card at Verified by Visa or SecureCode system By MasterCard, will have to associate a password or any other form of authentication to carry out and complete online payments.
Usually at the time of purchase with those credit cards additional authentication steps are required (p.e. a password is sent to the customer phone). If at the time of authentication the customer mistakenly enter or not enter at all this password or other element, the payment is not made.

For more infos on this, please check for VISA cards:
https://www.visaeurope.com/making-payments/verified-by-visa/

For MasterCard:
https://www.mastercard.us/en-us/consumers/features-benefits/securecode.html

All the tickets you have bought

Once you're finished buying tickets or adding services just click the "Proceed to payment" option to finalize your order

multilingual\/croatian\/.title: Croatian
multilingual\/croatian\/.body:
BOOM FESTIVAL, UNIVERZALNA PORUKA

Boom nije samo festival, to je transformacijsko iskustvo izgradnje nove kulture.  

Boom zrcali promjene koje evoluiraju u svemiru stvarajući jedinstveno iskustvo koje  obuhvaća uživanje u prirodi, neotribalizam, najbolje od suvremene muzike, predavanja globalnih aktivista koja stimuliraju um te inspiriraju kroz likovnu  umjetnost.

Boom se pridržava principa razmišljanja „izvan okvira“, reflektirjući nove načine izražavanja samih sebe sjedinjenjem alternativne i psihodelične kulture svijeta.

To je tjedan dana dugo iskustvo, daleko od dominantne kulture na suncem okupanom portugalskom tlu, neokaljanom nuklearnim otpadom.

Vi ste glavni razlog za Boom – vi ste Boomer!

 

MEĐUKULTURALNO

Mi smo ujedinjeno pleme svijeta, a ovo je šareno, međukulturalno okupljanje!

Prijatelji iz više od 151 zemalja ujedinit će se kako bi vizualizirali i manifestirali jednu pozitivnu viziju za budućnost.

To je utočište u svemiru nove planetarne kulture dok iza sebe ostavljamo predrasude i nametanja kulturološkog determinizma. Mi smo Jedno! 


 

PRIRODA I PLAŽA

Na  Boomu se čini kao da je vrijeme stalo... Boom se održava usred prirodnog raja okruženog stoljetnim pirenejskim stablima, razigranim vrtovima i drevnim jezerom koje reflektira čaroliju punog mjeseca, planinama i nevjerojatnim panoramskim pejzažem. Na obalama svjetlucavog, gotovog beskonačnog jezera, osjetite slobodu uživanja na plaži i upijanja portugalskog sunca  kako biste ostvarili bezbrižno, kontemplirajuće, opuštajuće i pozitivno raspoloženje.

Zahvaljujemo svetoj Zemlji na ovom prekrasnom poklonu. Molimo da ga poštujete!

 

ZNANJE 

Selo  Liminal je Boomovo kulturno središte. Od 2000. godine Boom poziva neke od najaktivnijih mislilaca i aktivista kako psihodelične tako i alternativne kulture. Predavanjima i govorima o temama kao što su aktivizam, psihodelija, slobodni kulturološki prostori, drevni obredi, mitologija,ekologija, svijet snova, permakultura , trans, sveto bilje i alternativna znanost – u selu Liminal utvrđujemo stvarnost nove planetarne kulture na putu prema 2016. godini.

Neki od gostiju koji su do sada prisustvovali su: Vandana Shiva, Alex Grey, Daniel Pinchbeck,  Graham Hancock, Tony Andrews, Romio Shesthra, Robert Venosa, Erik Davis,  shipibo Don Guillermo Arevalo.

Također postoji Paradigm Films 2016 – program koji traje tjedan dana, a prikazuje filmove u kojima kinemaografija istražuje mrežu najnovijih paradigmi suprotstavljenih  s onime što nam dominantna kultura propovijeda.

 

PSIHODELIČNI MUZEJ UMJETNOSTI 

Ovo je jedan od Boomovih najkreativnijih i najstimulativnijih portala. Umjetnici vizionari i slikari dolaze sa svakog kontinenta, doprinoseći zadivljujućoj kolekciji umjetnina za nevjerojatnu izložbu višestrukih platforma izražavanja – prelazeći percepciju i otključavajući kanale kreativnosti.

 

UMJETNIČKE INSTALACIJE

Umjetnost omogućava direktan ulaz u dublje slojeve našeg postojanja, vodeći nas na put koji na nas utječe kako muzika ne može. Poput slike, skulpture, pejzažne umjetnosti ili filma, ova umjetnost nas vodi izvan poznatih granica, na novi teren, izborom 12-ak umjetničkih instalacija najboljih i najinventivnijih umjetnika u svemiru, koji stvaraju sinestetsko psihodelično iskustvo, stvarajući snažne promjene duboko unutar ljudske psihe

Uključite se i isključite misli!

 

MUZIKA

Kroz nekoliko različitih faza stvaranja, Boom predstavlja slobodoumno okupljanje psihodeličnog pokreta. Fokusiran  na otkrivanje delikatesa underground muzičke scene internacionalnoj publici,  Boom iskustvo se bazira na povezanosti, a ne samo na postavi. Naši zvukovi obuhvaćaju žanrove bazirane na psihodeličnim inspiracijama  spanning ambient, psytrance, dub, world music, space i dub-techno, bass muzika, glitch, nu-funk, progressive, IDM, neo-trance, cosmic i psybreaks.

 Povežite se s ritmom ljubavi! 

 

HRAM PLESA

Ovo je puls Booma! Hram plesa je mjesto futurističkog tribal plesa koji nas ujedinjuje s  univerzalnim duhom psihodeličnog trancea. Kako bismo se povezali s transformativnim značenjem 2016.-e, pozivamo najbolje izvođače koji nastupaju uživo te tribal bendove da sviraju duže setove za bolje trance iskustvo – u tom procesu ukidajući pojam količine nad kvalitetom. Ovdje njegujemo našu kolektivnu ljubav prema raznovrsnosti trance-a i upuštamo se u avanturu koja istražuje komplicirane dimenzije psy, dark, twilight, forest, tribal, prog, full-on, fusion, groovy full-on, Goa i nu-Goa, da spomenemo samo neke. 

Boom nije vođen idejom takozvanog „zvjezdanog sustava“ ili  line-up festivala. Naprotiv, Boom zaobilazi svijet egoizma, naglašavajući štovanje zajedničkog iskustva glazbenika, DJ-a, VJ-a, dekoratera, dizajnera i najvažnije, publike – dok svi oni kanaliziraju kreativnu silu za kolektivnu transcendenciju kroz ples svih živih bića.

OKOLIŠ

Boom Program zaštite okoliša  primjenjuje načela permakulture na festivalu  što je prepoznato i nagrađeno sljedećim nagradama: „Outstanding Greener Festival Award“ 2008, 2010,2012, 2014, nagradom „European Festival Award“ 2010 te „Green Inspiration Award“ 2012., dokazujući kako je zaista moguće ostvariti skupljanje ljudi koji poštuju svetu Zemlju.

Koristimo  100% kompostne toalete; svu vodu (100%) tretiramo biljkama i besplatno dijelimo džepne pepeljare; u generatorima koristimo otpadno biljno ulje te kreiramo rješenja temeljena na vodi, Eko Timu, solarnoj energiji, zdravstvu, vjetrenjačama te bio-izgradnji. Pridružite se svojoj braći  i sestrama i otkrijte nove načine življenja pozitivnog okruženja.

NE OSTAVLJAJTE TRAG! 

 

DUHOVNOST

Na Boomu mi razvijamo ideju duhovnog društvenog aktivizma s raznolikim programom liječenja, joge, ajurvede, tai chi-ja, kung fu-a, watsu-a, terapija i holističkih učenja.

Buđenjem i njegovanjem svoga duhovnog bića pridonosimo  univerzalnim  vrijednostima i pomažemo društvene promjene. Mi smo Svi.

OBJEKTI

Besplatna voda, besplatno kampiranje, besplatan park za kamp kućice.

Baby Boom za mini Boomere (povedite svoje obitelji na Boom!). Besplatna lječnička pomoć. Sefovi. Prijevoz Boom autobusom od lisabonskog i madridskog aerodroma. 100% kompostni toaleti. 100% tuševi tretirani biljkama. Ajurvedska ljekarna. Posebni objekti za osobe s invaliditetom. Trgovina. Zajednička kuhinja i puno, puno više!! 

PODRUČJE BEZ KORPORATIVNOG LOGA

Boom je i uvijek će biti potpuno slobodno od korporativnog sponzoriranja te se financira samo prodajom ulaznica. Mi smo festival oslobođen korporacija, zona kognitivne slobode koja je organski rasla usmenom predajom od 1997. godine. Boom tim svoja nastojanja usmjerava ka kreiranju paralelnog svemira čiji ste najvažniji dio vi. Učinite da se dogode promjene.
 

POSEBNE POTREBE

Objekte želimo prilagoditi osobama s invaliditetom. Ukoliko ste vi ili netko od vaših prijatelja osoba s invaliditetom, molimo vas, pošaljite nam mail do lipnja 2016. godine kako bi im osigurali posebne uvjete: specialneeds@boomfestival.org

 

BOOM 2016 ULAZNICE

Boom ulaznice možete kupiti na dva načina:

- Online: Posjetite našu web stranicu i kupite svoju ulaznicu online;

- Putem Boom Ambasadora: Naše su ulaznice dostupne u više od 50 zemalja kroz mrežu naših Boom Ambasadora.

Posebne cijene za pojedine države

Cijene ulaznica bazirane su na temelju ekonomske situacije svake pojedine države. 

Prijateljska cijena

Također imamo prijateljsku cijenu za ljude koji žive u denominiranim zemljama u razvoju

Lista zemalja u razvoju je kako slijedi:

Bugarska, Hrvatska, Češka Republika, Estonija, Gruzija, Mađarska, Kazahstan,

Ulaznice s prijateljskom cijenom nisu prenosive i mogu se nabaviti samo kod vaših lokalnih Ambasadora. Kako bi vam se odobrio ovaj popust, vaš će lokalni ambasador od vas zatražiti dokaz o državljanstvu.**

multilingual\/czech\/.title: Czech
multilingual\/czech\/.body:
Boom Festival, Univerzální Poselství

Boom není jenom festival, je to zkušenost, která vás zmení a prispeje k vnímání nové kultury.
Boom zrcadlí zmeny, odehrávající se v univerzální realite , které rozvíjí nové zkušenosti. Užívat si prírody, znovuobjevení kmenové kultury, poslouchat nekterou z nejlepších soucasných hudebních produkcí, prednášky, provokující zamyšlení soucasných svetových aktivistu, inspirace nejlepšího umení.- To je Boom.
Boom se pevne drží príkladu „volného uvažování“ vyjadruje tím nové zpusoby, jak se vyjádrit formou sloucení alternativní a psychedelické svetové kultury. Je to týdenní zkušenost daleko od dominantní kultury, v portugalských slunecných a nekontaminovaných krajinách. 
Jsi hlavní duvod Boomu— Jsi Boomer!

Mezikulturní

Jsme spojený kmen sveta a tento festival je mnohokulturní setkaní! Pratele z více než 151 zemí se tady sejdou aby visualizovali a manifesovali pozitivní predstavu budoucnosti. Nechávaje za sebou predsudky a neprimerené požadavky kulturního determinizmu. Všichni za jednoho!


 

Príroda a pláž

Zdá se, že cas se zastavil v Boomu... Boom se koná v prírodním ráji spolu se staletými iberskými stromy, carovnými zahradami a cistým kouzelným jezerem, které odráží velkolepost mesíce v úplnku, horami, a neuveritelnými panoramatickými krajinami. U nekonecných brehu, trpytivého jezera, se uvolnete do poklidné a pozitivní nálady. Za tento krásný dar dekujeme naši svaté planete zemi. Prosím respektujte ji!

Znalostí

Liminal Village je kulturní centrum Boomu. Od roku 2000 Boom zve myslitele a aktivisty, cinné v psychedelické nebo alternativní kulture. Liminal Village potvrzuje zkušenost nové univerzální kultury, nabízející prednášky a rozhovory na témata aktivistu, psychedelie, volných kulturních prostoru, rituálu našich predchudcu, mytologie, ekologie, a fantastických kraju. Liminal Village potvrzuje vznik nové globální kultury pro rok 2016.
Úcastníci, mimo jiných, zahrnují Vandana Shiva, Alex Grey, Daniel Pinchbeck, Graham Hancock, Tony Andrews, Romion Shesthra, Robert Venosa, Erik Davis, a shipibo Don Guillermo Arevalo.
Jsou zde také zahrady a Paradigm Films 2016 – celotýdenní filmový program, behem kterého cinematografové budou zkoumat sít soucasných paradigmu v kontrastu s tím, co nás ucí dominantní kultura.

Psychedelické Muzeum Umení

Tento Muzeum je jedno z nejvíce kreativních a stimulujících portálu Boomu. Vizionárští umelci a malíri se sejdou ze všech kontinentu, aby se spolupodíleli na ohromné sbírce umeleckých del pro prekvapující výstavu, která presahuje a otvírá cesty kreativity.

Instalace Umení

Umení nám umožnuje prímý prístup k hlubším úrovním našeho bytí, vede nás na cestu, která nás ovlivnuje zpusobem, kterým hudba nemuže. Stejne jako malba, socharství, krajina, nebo video, pouštíme se do nového prostoru, za známé limity, s výberem tuctu umeleckých instalací od nejlepších a nejtvorivejších umelcu ve vesmíru, kterí tvorí synestetickou, psychedelickou zkušenost, která umožnuje mocnou zmenu hluboko uvnitr lidské psyché. Nech se unést umení!

Hudba

Boom reprezentuje objektivní seskupení psychedelického hnutí které zahrnuje hodne ruzných scén. Boom se soustreduje na poodhalení lahodností underground hudby pro mezinárodní posluchace. Zážitek Boomu je o vzájemném propojení a ne jenom o line up. Naše zvukové  krajiny obsahují žánry zakládající se na psychedelické inspirací, které zahrnují ambient, psytrance, dub, world music, space a dub-techno, bass, glitch, nu funk, progressive, IDM, neo-trance, cosmic a psybreaks. Spojte se s love groove!

Stredisko Tance

Tohle je tep Boomu! Chrám Tance je futuristický tribal-dance spojující nás s univerzálním duchem psychedelické trance hudby. Abychom se priblížili k transformacnímu významu roku 2016, pozvali jsme ty nejlepší dýdžeje, živá vystoupení a tribal kapely, aby zahráli delší sady pro hlubší prožitek tranceu - rušíme myšlenku, že množství je více než kvalita. Tím živíme naši spolecnou lásku k rozmanitosti trance a vydáváme se na dobrodružství, které zkoumá složité rozmery psychedilie, tmy, soumraku, lesu, tribalu, progresivity, naplnení, fúze, bájecného naplnení,Goa a neu - Goa a dalších. Boom není rízen myšlenkou tzv. hvezdného systému, kdy seznam interpretu tvorí známí umelci, jako na vetšine festivalech. Naopak vybocuje z oblasti egoismu a vytvárí hold spolupráci se zkušenými hudebníky, dýdžwji, VJs, dekoratéry a projektanty. Ale to nejduležitejší je, že to vytvárí pro verejnost - to vše dohromady vytvárí tvurcí síly pro kolektivní transcendence skrze tanec všech živých bytostí 

Zivotní Prostredí

Boom Festival aplikuje principy permakultury ve svém programu životního prostredí. Tento program byl vyznamenán rádem Oustanding Greener Festival Award v letech 2008 , 2010, a 2012, rádem European Festival Award v roce 2010, a rádem Green Inspiration Award v roce 2012, dokazující že je skutecne možné vytváret setkání lidí která respektují svatou zemi.
Používáme 100% kompostující toalety, 100% vody je cišteno rostlinami; zdarma dáváme kapesní popelnícky; v generátorech používáme odpadový zeleninový olej. Rozvijeme ruzné nápady využití vodní energie: EcoTeam, slunecné energie, hygieny, vetrných mlýnu a rešení založena na biokonstrukci. Prijdte a pridejte se ke svým bratrum a sestrám a objevte nové zpusoby, jak žít pozitivne v našem prostredí.
Nezanechávej za sebou žádnou stopu!

Spiritualita

V Boomu propagujeme ideu spirituálního spolecenského aktivizmu s rozsáhlým programem v oblastech hojení, jógy, ayurveda, tai chi, kung fu, watsu, léceb a holistických výuk. Pomáháme vám probouzet si vaše spirituální bytí a také pecovat o telesnou a dušení pohodu, abychom zvýraznili a manifestovali univerzální hodnoty a pomohli zavést spolecenské zmeny. My jsme všechno.

Vybavení

Voda, kemping, a park pro karavany nabízíme zdarma. Je zde také Baby Boom pro naše nejmladší (prijedte s celou rodinou!). Zdravotní pomoc zdarma. Bezpecnostní skrínky. Kyvadlová autobusová doprava z lisabonského a madridského letište. 100% kompostující toalety. 100% sprch, které jsou cišteny pomocí rostlin. Ayurveda lékárna. Speciální vybavení pro postižené. Obchod s potravinami. 
Spolecenská kuchyne, a mnohem mnohem vice!

Zóna No Corporate Logo

Boom je, a vždy bude, úplne volný jakéhokoliv sponzorování od korporací a je výlucne financován prodejem vstupenek náš festival. Není zaštíten žádnou korporací naopak je to zóna volného poznávání. Organicky se rozrustá od roku 1997. Náš tým se snaží vytvorit paralelní vesmír, kterého vy jste ta nejduležitejší soucást. Nechme probehnout zmenu.
 

Speciální Potreby

Pro osoby s postižením bychom rádi vylepšili vybavení. Jestliže vy, nebo nekdo z vašich prátel, trpí postižením, pošlete nám, prosím, e-mail do cervna 2016, abychom vám mohli zarucit potrebné podmínky: specialneeds@boomfestival.org

 

BOOM 2016 VSTUPENKY

Vstupenky si mužete koupit dvema zpusoby:

- Online: navštivte naší internetovou stránku a kupte tam
- Ambasadori Boomu: vstupenky si mužete zakoupit od našich ambasadoru ve více než 50 zemích.


Speciální ceny pro každou zemi

Na základe ekonomických rozdílu, v ruzných zemí se ceny vstupenek liší.


Prátelské ceny

Príznivé ceny nabízíme lidem ve jmenovaných rozvíjejících se zemí. Seznam rozvíjejících se zemí a 
oblastí je následující:

* Řecko 
* Afrika
* Blízký Východ, Asie a Pacifik, krome Izraele, Japonska, Nového Zélandu, Ománu, Kataru, a 
Spojených Arabských Emirátu;
* Mexiko, Karibik, Centrální a Jižní Amerika
* Strední a Východní Evropa: Albánie, Arménie, Ázerbájdžán, Belorusko, Bosna, Bulharsko, 
Chorvatsko, Ceska republika, Estonsko, Gruzie, Madarsko, Kazachstán, Kyrgyzstán, Litva, Lotyško, 
Makedonie, Cerná Hora, Moldávie, Rumunsko, Rusko, Srbsko, Slovensko, Slovinsko, Tádžikistán, 
Turecko, Turkmenistán, Ukrajina a Uzbekistán


Prátelské ceny jsou neprenosné a jsou k dostání jen od vašeho místního ambasadora. Abyste získali 
slevu, budete muset predložit dukaz o vaší státní rezidence vašemu místnímu ambasadorovi.


Vstupenka na Festival Boom Zdarma

multilingual\/danish\/.body:
BOOM FESTIVAL – ET UNIVERSELT BUDSKAB

Boom er ikke kun en festival, det er en transformerende begivenhed, hvor der frembringes en ny kultur.

Boom afspejler de ændringer, der sker ved at skabe en unik oplevelse for folk. Det handler om at nyde naturen, neo-tribalisme, noget af det bedste moderne musik, sindsbevægende foredrag af aktivister fra hele verden og inspirerende kunstværker.

Boom følger princippet om at tænke uden for boksen, hvilket ses ved, at vi samler de alternative og psykedeliske kulturer i verden og finder nye måder at udtrykke os selv på. Det er en uges oplevelser i de portugisiske, solrige, uspolerede lande – fri for radioaktivitet og væk fra den dominerende kultur.

Du er dét, der ligger til grund for Boom – en Boomer!

INTERKULTUREL

Vi er verdens forenede stamme og dette er en farvefuld og interkulturel forsamling! Venner fra mere end 151 forskellige lande finder sammen, for at visualisere og manifestere en positiv vision for fremtiden. Det er en oase i kosmos for en ny planetarisk kultur, hvor vi lægger vores fordomme og  kulturelle dogmer bag os.

We Are One!


 

NATUR OG STRAND

På Boom, synes tiden at stå stille… Boom afholdes i et naturligt paradis, fyldt med århundredgamle iberiske træer, finurlige haver og en uberørt sø, hvor de magiske afspejlinger af fuldmånen, bjergene og det utrolige panorama landskab fortryller dit sind. Ved bredden af det der ligner en sø, som bliver ved i en uendelighed, kan du mærke friheden ved at dase på stranden, mens du slikker det portugisiske solskin og nyder den tilbagelænede, eftertænksomme, afslappede og positive stemning. Vi takker Sacred Earth for denne smukke gave. Vær søde at respektere det!
 

VIDEN

The Liminal Village er Booms kulturelle hjerte. Siden år 2000 har Boom inviteret nogle af de mest aktive tænkere og aktivister fra både den psykedeliske og alternative kultur. Med foredrag og samtaler om emner der spænder over aktivisme, psykedelia, frie kulturelle rum , vore forfædres ritualer, mytologi, økologi, Dreamscapes, Permakultur, trance, hellige planter og alternativ videnskab – i The Liminal Village har vi sikret os, at en ny planetarisk kultur er på vej til 2016. Nogle af de gæster, der deltog var Vandana Shiva, Alex Grey, Daniel Pinchbeck, Graham Hancock, Tony Andrews, Romio Shesthra, Robert Venosa, Erik Davis og Shipibo Don Guillermo Arevalo

Derudover er der et ugelangt program med film, hvor filmfotografer ser nærmere på de paradigmer, der prædkes for os af den dominerende kultur.

PSYKEDELISK KUNSTMUSEUM

Dette er et af Booms mest kreative og stimulerende hjørner. Visionære kunstnere og malere fra alle kontinenter forenes og bidrager med en fantastisk samling af kunstværker. Denne sindsvækkende udstilling, der indeholder mange forskellige udtryksformer, bryder med opfattelsen og åbner for kreativiteten.

KUNSTINSTALLATIONER

Kunst giver adgang til dybere planer af vores eksistens og tager os med på en rejse, der påvirker os på måder, som musikken ikke kan. Med malerier, skulpturer, land art (jordkunst) og film, vover vi os ud over grænserne. Gå på opdagelse mellem snesevis af kunstinstallationer fra de mest opfindsomme kunstnere i kosmos og få en synæstetisk, psykedelisk oplevelse, der bibringer en kraftig forandring, dybt i vores menneskelige psyke.
Tune in and drop out!
 

MUSIK

På Booms meget forskellige scener, repræsenteres en fordomsfri forsamling, af den psykedeliske bevægelse. Fokus er rettet mod at finde det lækreste undergrundsmusik  til et internationalt publikum – ikke for at få en fed line-up, men for at opdage forbindelsen mellem os. Booms soundscapes omfatter genrer, der er baseret på psykedelisk inspiration og spænder over ambient, psytrance, dub, world music, space og dub-techno, bass music, glitch, nu-funk, progressive, IDM, neo-trance, cosmic og psybreaks. Lad os forenes i dans og kærlighed!
 

DANCE TEMPLE

Dette er Booms hjerte! The Dance Temple er et futuristisk tribal-dance område, der forener os med ånden af psykedelisk trance. For at tilslutte os den transformative betydning for 2016 inviterer vi de bedste DJs, live acts og tribal bands til at spille lange sets for en dybere tranceoplevelse – og i processen afskaffe begrebet om kvantitet frem for kvalitet. Her vil vi nære vores kollektive kærlighed til mangfoldigheden af trance og gå på eventyr i de indviklede dimensioner af psy, dark, twilight, forest, tribal, prog, full-on, fusion, groovy full-on, Goa og nu-Goa for blot at nævne et par stykker.
Boom er ikke drevet af et såkaldt ”star-system”, eller at line-ups er det, der skaber en festival. Tværtimod adskiller vi os fra egoismens rige og hylder den kollaborative oplevelse af musikere, DJs, VJs, dekoratører, designere og vigtigst af alt, det offentlige – hver især kanaliserer de en kreativ kraft, mod en kollektiv trancendens gennem dans, til alle levende væsener.

MILJØ

Booms Environmental Program benytter sig af permakulturens principper på festivalen. For dette, er vi blevet belønnet med Outstanding Greener Festival Award i 2008, 2010 og 2012, the European Festival Award i 2010 og Green Inspiration Award 2012, der viser, hvor let det egentlig er, at skabe en sammenkomst af mennesker, der respekterer vores hellige Jord. Vi bruger udelukkende komposterende toiletter. Vi renser 100% af det vand vi bruger, ved hjælp af planter og uddeler gratis lomme-askebægre. Vi bruger vegetabilsk spildolie i vores generatorer og udvikler flere løsninger baseret på vandbrug,  EcoTeam, solenergi, sanitet, vindmøller og bio-konstruktioner. Kom og slut dig til dine brødre og søstre og opdag nye, postive måder at leve miljøvenligt på.

EFTERLAD INGEN SPOR!

ÅNDELIGHED

På Boom går vi forrest med ideen om åndelig og social aktivisme. Vores omfattende program består af healing, yoga, Ayurveda, tai chi, kung fu, watsu, forskellige behandlingsformer og holistisk lære. Vi vækker dit åndelige væsen og plejer din trivsel ved at forstørre og åbenbare universelle værdier og hjælper med at gennemføre sociale forandringer.
We Are All.
 

FACILITETER

Gratis vand og gratis camping. Baby Boom for mini-Boomere (Ja! Tag hele familien med!). Gratis lægehjælp. Aflåste garderobeskabe. Boom bus shuttle service fra Lissabon og Madrid lufthavne. Ayurveda apotek. Særlige faciliteter for handicappede. En købmand. Fælles køkken og meget, meget mere!!
 

LOGO-FRIT OMRÅDE

Boom er, og vil altid være, helt fri for virksomheders sponsorering og er finansieret af billetsalget alene. Vi er en festival, der ikke er drevet af selskaber, en zone af kognitiv frihed, der er vokset naturligt ved hjælp af ”mund-til-mund”-princippet siden 1997. Boom teamet dedikerer sin indsats til at skabe et parallelt univers, hvor du er den vigtigste del.
Make Change Happen!
 

SÆRLIGE BEHOV

Vi ønsker at forbedre faciliteterne for handicappede. Hvis du eller nogle af dine venner er handicappede, så send os en e-mail inden juni 2016, så vi kan sørge for særlige forhold til jer eller dem: specialneeds@boomfestival.org

 

BOOM 2016 - BILLETTER

Du kan købe din Boom billet på to måder:

- Online: Besøg vores hjemmeside og få din online-billet.
- Boom Ambassadører : Vi har billetter i mere end 50 lande som kan fås gennem vores Boom ambassadør netværk.

Særlige priser for hvert land

Vi har forskellige billetpriser baseret på de økonomiske forskelle i de enkelte lande.

Venne pris

Vi har også en venne pris for mennesker, der bor i visse udviklingslande. Listen over udviklingslande og regioner er følgende:

• Grækenland 
• Afrika
• Mellemøsten, Asien og Stillehavsområdet, med undtagelse af Australien , Israel, Japan , New Zealand, Oman , Qatar og De Forenede Arabiske Emirater
• Mexico , Caribien, Central-og Sydamerika 
• Central-og Østeuropa : Albanien , Armenien, Aserbajdsjan, Hviderusland , Bosnien, Bulgarien, Kroatien, Tjekkiet, Estland , Georgien, Ungarn , Kasakhstan, Kirgisistan , Letland, Litauen , Makedonien, Montenegro , Republikken Moldova , Rumænien, Rusland , Serbien, Slovakiet, Slovenien, Tadsjikistan , Tyrkiet, Turkmenistan , Ukraine, Usbekistan .

Venne pris-billetter kan ikke overdrages og fås kun hos din lokale ambassadør. For at få denne rabat, vil din lokale ambassadør kræve, at du viser dokumentation for national opholdstilladelse.**

 

Special pris-billetter kan kun købes hos ambassadørerne i hvert enkelt land. De er ikke tilgængelige online. Alle, der køber en af disse billetter, skal fremvise pas ved portene .

GRATIS BOOM BILLET

Japan


BILLETTER

Tjek www.boomfestival.org og klik på „Tickets“ i menuen.

multilingual\/deutsch\/.body:
Die Boom ist nicht nur ein Festival – Sie ist ein Lebensstil

Es sind kleine Momente, in denen das Lernen stattfindet. Jene Momente in denen du versteht wie wichtig es ist, Fünfe einfach mal gerade sein zu lassen. Jene Momente in denen dir klar wird, dass du es an anderen Stellen genauer nehmen musst. Diese kleinen Momente prägen dich, deine Einstellung und dein Handeln – und mit dir die Grundlage für große Veränderungen. Genau hier setzt die Idee der Boom an: Als schillernder Kristallisationspunkt einer neuzeitlichen Stammeskultur möchte sie in erster Linie inspirieren. Und zwar durch jene magische Erfahrung, die zwischen psychedelischer Musik, visionärer Kunst, therapeutischer Praxis und intellektuell-spirituellem Input entsteht. 

Veränderung fängt bei dir an, bei deiner Weltanschauung. Du bist der Flügelschlag des Schmetterlings, der am anderen Ende der Welt einen Wetterumschwung bewirkt. Lerne, deine Flügel zu gebrauchen!

Zu diesem Zweck kippen wir das Schubladensystem, das unseren Alltag bestimmt, einfach mal aus. Und zwar mitten hinein in die sonnige, unverdorbene, nuklearfreie Natur Portugals. Dann nehmen wir uns 7 Tage lang Zeit, um spielerisch neue Denkwege und Handlungsweisen, um eine neue Ordnung zu erkunden. Das ist unsere Vision von psychedelischer Kultur, und sie wollen wir aktiv vortreiben.

Auf dieser Webseite findet ihr ausführliche Informationen zu den freien Künsten, den multidimensionalen Installationen und den kreativen Liebensbomben, die auf unsere temporäre autonome Zone regnen werden.

Boom ist eine Lebenseinstellung – und sie lebt in euch, liebe Boomer!
 

INTERKULTURELL

Andere Länder, andere Lebensstile. Auf der Boom kannst du erleben wie inspirativ diese einfache Tatsache ist. Und zwar in konzentrierter Form: Im Jahr 2012 reisten Stammesangehörige aus 151 verschiedenen Ländern an, um in ihrer multikulturellen Mischung eine durchweg positive Vision für die Zukunft zu manifestieren: We Are One – Wir sind eins!
 


NATUR

Die Kulisse für unser Stammestreffen gestaltet die wohl besten Dekorateurin überhaupt: Mutter Natur. Jene jahrhundertealte iberische Baumlandschaft der umliegenden Hügel, versonnene Gärten und der weitläufige See, in dem sich die Magie des August-Vollmonds spiegelt, schaffen ein einzigartiges Panorama.
 

STRAND

Nachdem du dich in schwitzende Trance getanzt hast oder wenn dir die Wärme des portugiesischen Sommers zuviel werden sollte: Die nötige Erfrischung ist maximal ein paar hundert Meter entfernt - egal wo du gerade bist. Der große See bestimmt nicht nur das Bild der Boom, sondern auch ihre Stimmung. Wie beim Strandurlaub kannst du jene fließende Ruhe des Wassers aufsaugen, die dich sanft umspült.

 

 

DESIGN FÜR DEN GEIST

Das Liminal Village bietet Gelegenheit, dir dein Oberstübchen neu einzurichten: Mit Lebensphilosophie und praktischem Wissen. Im intellektuellen Brennpunkt der Boom finden Vorträge und Diskussionen zu Themen wie Aktivismus, Psychedelik, Freie Kultur, Rituale der Ahnen, Mythologie, Ökologie, Traumlandschaften, Permakultur, Trance, Heilige Pflanzen oder Alternative Medizin und Wissenschaft statt. Dazu waren in den letzten Jahren Referenten wie Vandana Shiva, Alex Grey, Daniel Pinchbeck, Graham Hancock, Robert Venosa, Erik Davis und Shipibo Don Guillermo Arevalo zu Gast. Ein Filmprogramm zur neuen, planetarischen Kultur bietet noch mehr Stimulation auf intellektueller Ebene.
 

 

PSYCHEDELISCHES KUNSTMUSEUM

Was ist psychedelische Kunst, was visionäre? Will sie die Eindrücke einer psychedelischen Erfahrung wiedergeben? Will sie ähnliche Emotions- und Assoziationsstrukturen auslösen wie eine Vision? Mach dir selbst ein Bild! In atemberaubender Vielfalt präsentieren einige der talentiertesten Maler von allen Kontinenten des Planeten ihre bewusstseinserweiternden Werke.
 

 

INSTALLATIONEN

Bildende Kunst stößt die Pforten unserer Wahrnehmung weit auf und eröffnet uns so die Sicht auf Aspekte unserer Realität, welche normalerweise hinter dem Grauschleier des Alltags verborgen liegen. Um dich mitten hinein in dieses ästhetisch-surreale Paralleluniversum zu katapultieren, kommen überall auf dem Gelände Medien wie Malerei, Bildhauerei, Land Art oder Video zum Einsatz. Sie lassen deine Reise über die Boom zu einer Reise in eine außerirdische Welt von fremdartiger Schönheit werden.
 

 

MUSIK

Über verschiedene Tanzplätze verteilt verwirklicht die Boom ihre psychedelische Vision im Spektrum der hörbaren Frequenzen. Dabei kommen viele verschiedene Rhythmus- und Harmonie-Texturen zum Einsatz, die alle darauf abzielen, deine Synapsen zu kitzeln, deine Fantasie zu stimulieren und deinen Geist und deine Seele zu beflügeln. Die Klanglandschaften der Boom erstrecken sich von Psytrance, Forest und Goa Trance bis zu Ambient und Chillout, von Dark Progressive und Tech Trance bis zu Bass Music und Cosmic Dicso, von Psy Breaks und Glitch Hop bis zu Afro Beat, Psych Rock und Organic Trance. In ihrer Gesamtheit schwingen sich all diese Genres zum kosmischen Groove der universellen Liebe auf.

 

 

TANZ

Mit jedem Herzschlag der Boom bebt das portugiesische Hinterland. Im monumentalen Tanztempel verschmelzen utopische Zukunftsvisionen und das archaische Ritual des Stammenstanz zu einer einzigartigen Trance-Erfahrung. Um euer Bewusstsein dorthin zu schicken, wo Worte zu Hülsen und Bedeutungen zu Variablen werden, haben wir einige der besten DJs, Liveacts und Tribal Bands eingeladen. Mit viel Liebe zum Detail planen wir eine Reise durch jene multidimensionale Welt namens Psy, wobei wir in Regionen wie Dark, Twilight, Forest, Tribal, Progressive, Full-On, Groovy Full-On, Goa und Nu-Goa vorstoßen. Trotz seiner monumentalen Größe ist der Tanztempel jedoch keineswegs der 'Mainfloor' - denn die Boom ist als ganzes ein Mainfloor für psychedelische Kultur. Die anderen Musikbereiche, nämlich der Alchemy Circle, die Chill Out Gardens, das Sacred Fire und die Natraj Dance Stage, sind also genau so wichtig und deshalb genau so aufwändig gestaltet.


Die Grundidee der Boom unterscheidet sich ganz erheblich von der einer kommerziellen Massenproduktion. Wir möchten raus aus dem Schattenreich des Egoismus, hinein in eine kollektive Erfahrung. Mithilfe von DJs, VJs, Dekorateuren, Designern und -am allerwichtigsten- mithilfe von euch, den Boomern. Auf dass wir unsere multikulturelle kreative Energie zu einer wahrhaft großen Erfahrung vereinen: Wir sind eins!
 

UMWELT

Auf der Boom werden die Erkenntnisse und Prinzipien der Permakultur in ein Festival umgesetzt. So wird ganz konkret erfahrbar: Auch große, internationale Menschenansammlungen lassen sich mit maximalem Respekt vor unserer heiligen Mutter Natur vereinbaren. Dieser Ansatz wurde in den Jahren 2008, 2010, 2012 und 2014 mit dem Greener Festival Award ausgezeichnet, 2010 außerdem mit dem European Festival Award. 

Auf der Boom kommen ausschließlich Komposttoiletten zum Einsatz. Das Nutzwasser wird mithilfe von Pflanzen zu 100% wiederaufbereitet. Es gibt kostenlose Taschenaschenbecher. Für die Generatoren wird gebrauchtes Pflanzenöl verwendet. Der Boom Bus ermöglicht eine gleichsam ökologische, ökonomische und spaßige Form der Anreise. Außerdem nutzen wir Technologien wie Solarenergie, Windräder, Biobau und ökologische Abwasserentsorgung, die jedes Jahr weiterentwickelt werden. Auch hier gilt: Die Boom seid ihr, die Boomer. Tragt bitte dazu bei, dass sie ein nachhaltiges Festival ist. Respektiert Mutter Natur und hinterlasst keinen Müll!

 

SPIRITUALITÄT

Anreize für spirituell-sozialen Aktivismus, die sich in Form von Yoga, Ayurveda, Tai Chi, Kung Fu, Watsu, Therapien, alternativen Heilmethoden und ganzheitlichen Lehren manifestieren. Auch das ist ein zentraler Aspekt unserer Vision. Denn die Harmonie zwischen Geist und Körper ist ein erster Schritt in Richtung globale Harmonie.
 

INFRASTRUKTUR

Freies Wasser. Freies Camping. Freier Wohnmobil-Park. Kids'n'Seeds für die jüngsten Boomer (Familien sind auf der Boom ausdrücklich erwünscht). Freie medizinische Versorgung. Freies WIFI. Schließfächer. Boom-Busshuttle von den Flughäfen Lissabon und Madrid. 100% Komposttoiletten. 100% organische Aufbereitung des Abwassers mithilfe von Pflanzen. Ayurvedische Apotheke. Spezielle Einrichtungen für Behinderte. Lebensmittelgeschäft. Gemeinschaftsküchen. Und vieles, vieles mehr.
 

LOGO-FREIE ZONE

Die Boom finanziert sich einzig und allein über den Ticketverkauf, sie ist frei von jeglichem Firmen-Sponsoring und wird es immer sein. Auch in dieser Hinsicht möchten wir einen Freiraum schaffen, in dem sich der menschliche Geist unbefangen ausbreiten und entfalten kann. Obwohl das Boom Team den Rahmen schafft – das eigentliche Erlebnis, die eigentliche Inspiration und der eigentliche Geist lebt in euch. Denn ihr seid die Energie, ausgehend von euch kann sich diese Welt ändern.
 

BESONDERE BEDÜRFNISSE

Für Behidnerte beiten u.a. einen speziellen Campingplatz speziellen sanitären Einrichtungen sowie einen Shuttle-Servie auf dem Gelände.Wenn du oder jemand deiner Freunde eine Behinderung und daher besondere Bedürfnisse hat, schickt uns bitte bis Juni 2016 eine Email, so dass wir optimale Bedingungen garantieren können: specialneeds@boomfestival.org

 

 

GASTLAND JAPAN

Zu jeder Boom sprechen wir einem Szene-Hotspot dieses Planeten eine besondere Einladung aus. Zuerst war 2002 Brasilien dran, dann folgten Indien, Südafrika, Mazedonien, Chile,  Mexico und Polen. Für die Boom 2016 richten wir uns an die Bewohner eines Inselstaates, vor dessen Küste portugiesische Segelboote erstmals im Jahre 1543 ihre Anker warfen: Wir verschenken 500 Gratis-Tickets an die Boomer aus Japan.

 

TICKETS

BOOM Tickets könnt ihr auf verschiedene Weise erwerben.


ONLINE

Auf unserer Webseite könnt ihr Online-Tickets erstehen.


BOOM BOTSCHAFTER

In mehr als 50 Ländern sind Tickets über unser Netzwerk von BOOM- Botschaftern erhältlich.


FLEXIBLE EINTRITTSPREISE

Unser globaler Stamm ist in vielen verschiedenen Ländern zuhause, in denen ganz unterschiedliche Einkommensverhältnisse herrschen. Außerdem leben wir in Zeiten des finanziellen Abschwungs. Wir waren sehr betroffen als wir nach der Boom 2012 hörten, dass einige Menschen schlichtweg nicht genug Geld aufbringen konnten um Teil der kollektiven Erfahrung zu sein. Deshalb haben wir uns entschieden, auf diese Tatsache mit einem flexiblen Eintrittsmodell zu reagieren. Es gibt spezielle Ticketpreise für Länder außerhalb der Europäischen Union, der USA, Kanada, Australien, Neuseeland und Japan. 


FREIES BOOMTICKET

Im Jahr 2016 laden wir Japan als Gastland ein.


HINWEIS

Vorsicht vor gefälschten BOOM Tickets !
Kauf dein Online-Ticket ausschließlich über die Webseite der Boom. Wenn du ein physisches Boom Ticket möchtest, wende dich bitte an das Botschafternetzwerk der Boom, wie es auf unserer Website aufgeführt ist.


WEITERE INFOS ZU DEN TICKETS
Besuche www.boomfestival.org und das „Tickets“ Menu auf.

multilingual\/dutch\/.body:
BOOM IS GEEN FESTIVAL, HET IS EEN LEVENSSTIJL

Boom weerspiegelt de veranderingen die op universele schaal plaats vinden, door een unieke ervaring te bieden waarin natuur, neo-tribalisme, hedendaagse muziek, 
lezingen door activisten vanuit de hele wereld en inspirerende beeldende kunst worden samengevoegd.  
De sfeer van het festival is moeilijk elders te vinden. Boom ondersteunt het ‘out-of-the-box-denken’ door de alternatieve en psychedelische cultuur te verbinden. Ervaar deze week in het ongerepte , nucleair-vrije landschap van het zonnige Portugal. 

Boom is niet enkel een festival, het is een transformerende ervaring waarin een nieuwe cultuur wordt opgebouwd. 

Jij, Boomer, bent de belangrijkste reden voor Boom!

INTERCULTUREEL

Hier verzamelt de stam van de wereld zich in een kleurrijk, intercultureel evenement!
Uit meer dan 151 landen komen vrienden bijeen om een positieve kijk op de toekomst waar te maken. In een kleine hoek van het paradijs, ontstaat een nieuwe planetaire cultuur, waar we vooroordelen en opleggingen van cultureel determinisme achter ons laten. We zijn een!


 

NATUUR EN STRAND

Op Boom lijkt de tijd stil te staan… Het grondgebied waarop Boom plaats vindt is een waar paradijs op aarde: eeuwenoude Iberische bomen, speelse tuinen, een meer van ongerepte schoonheid die de magie van de maan, de majestueuze bergen en het adembenemende landschap weerspiegelt. 
Geniet van de Portugese zon aan de oneindige oevers van het meer. Hier vind je alles wat nodig is voor een relaxed en positief humeur. We danken Moeder Aarde voor dit prachtige geschenk. Respecteer het, alsjeblieft!

KENNIS

De Liminal Village is het culturele hart van Boom, waarin vanaf 2000 tal van conferenties over onderwerpen als activisme, psychedelica, vrije culturele plaatsen, voorvaderlijke riten, mythologie, ecologie, dreamscapes, permacultuur, trance, heilige geneeskrachtige planten en alternatieve wetenschap heeft plaatsgevonden. 
Bij de Liminal Village hebben we de realiteit van een nieuw planetaire cultuur bevestigd. Gasten die hier onder andere aan hebben meegewerkt zijn: Vandana Shiva, Alex Grey, Daniel Pinchbeck, Graham Hancock, Tony Andrews, Romio Shesthra, Robert Venosa, Erik Davis, Shipibo Don Guillermo Arevalo.
Mis ook niet de tuinen, galerieën en Paradigm Films 2016 – een filmprogramma over een nieuwe planetaire cultuur.

PSYCHEDELISCH KUNST MUSEUM

Dit is een van Boom’s meest creatieve en stimulerende plekken. Het herbergt een adembenemende verzameling van meesterwerken van internationale visionaire kunstenaars. De verbluffende expositie zal leiden tot perceptie-overstijgende kunstplatforms, en zal talloze manieren van creativiteit de vrije loop laten.

KUNST INSTALLATIES

Kunst geeft ons directe toegang tot de diepere lagen in ons bestaan, neemt ons mee op een reis die ons raakt op manieren waarop muziek dat niet kan. Zowel met schilderkunst, beeldhouwkunst, land-kunst of video, zoeken we buiten de grenzen van de waarneming naar nieuwe werelden. Tientallen installaties, gemaakt door de beste kunstenaars, brengen een zintuigprikkelende, psychedelische ervaring die zal leiden tot ingrijpende veranderingen binnen de menselijke geest. Laat je betoveren!

MUZIEK

Via een aantal verschillende podia, belichaamt Boom een ruimhartige verzameling van psychedelische bewegingen. De essentie van Boom is het openbaren van underground muziek aan een internationaal publiek. Het belangrijkste is niet enkel de line-up, het gaat om verbinding. Onze soundscape omvat een scala aan psychedelische genres zoals ambient, psytrance dub, world music, space and dub-techno, bass music, glitch, nu-funk, progressive, IDM, neo-trance, cosmic, and psybreaks.  

DANCE TEMPLE

Dit is het hart van Boom festival! De Dance Temple is een futuristisch tribal-dance gebied waar we met elkaar worden herenigd door psychedelische trance. Hier wordt voorrang gegeven aan de kwaliteit van kunstenaars, niet de kwantiteit. We willen liefde kweken voor psy, dark, forest, tribal, prog, full-on, fusion, groovy full-on, Goa en nu-Goa.
Boom heeft geen zogenaamd ‘sterrensysteem’ in de line-up zoals andere festivals. In plaats daarvan komt de line-up voort uit egotisme, waar het een eerbetoon uitoefent op de samenwerking tussen muzikanten, Dj’s, Vj’s, deco-kunstenaars, ontwerpers en, het belangrijkste, het publiek. 

MILIEU

Het Boom Environmental Program omvat de principes van permacultuur. Boom ontving de Outstanding Greener Festival Award 2008, 2010, 2012, the European Festival Award 2010 en the Green Inspiration Award 2012. Dit geeft aan dat er werkelijk een mogelijkheid is om festivals te organiseren waar Moeder Aarde wordt gerespecteerd. 
Wij maken uitsluitend gebruik composttoiletten; 100% van het water wordt hergebruikt voor de planten en we delen gratis zakasbakken uit. Voor de generatoren gebruiken we plantaardige olie en er wordt gebruik gemaakt van zonne- en windenergie. Ontdek samen met je broers en zussen hoe je op nieuwe manieren het milieu kan respecteren.
LAAT GEEN SPOOR ACHTER! 

SPIRITUALITEIT

Bij Boom houden we vast aan het idee van spiritueel sociaal activisme.  We hebben een ruim programma waarin genezing, yoga, Ayurveda, tai chi, kung fu, watsu, therapieën en holistische lessen worden aangeboden. Ontwaken je spirituele kracht en belichaam universele waarden en bevorder sociale veranderingen. Wij Zijn Allen. 

FACILITEITEN

We bieden gratis water, camping en ruimte voor campers. Ook zijn er gratis kluisjes, gratis medische zorg. We hebben Baby Boom voor de mini-Boomers (neem je familie mee naar Boom!), Er is een Boom Bus shuttle service van vliegvelden Lissabon en Madrid (tegen betaling). 100% composttoiletten, 100% plantaardige douches, Ayurveda geneeskunde. Er zijn speciale faciliteiten voor mindervaliden. We beschikken over een levensmiddelenwinkel, een community keuken en veel, veel meer! 

LOGOVRIJ FESTIVAL

Boom is en zal altijd een volledig onafhankelijk festival zijn. Het wordt enkel gefinancierd door ticketverkoop. Wij zijn een festival vrij van ondernemerschap, een zone van cognitieve vrijheid die sinds 1997 is gegroeid door mond-op-mond-reclame. Het Boom team wijdt zijn harde werken aan het creëren van een parallel universum waarvan jij het belangrijkste onderdeel bent. Maak Verandering Waar!
 

SPECIALE BEHOEFTEN

We willen de faciliteiten voor mindervaliden verbeteren. Als jij of een van je vrienden mindervalide is, stuur ons dan voor juni 2016 een email om verzekerd te zijn van speciale faciliteiten: specialneeds@boomfestival.org

 

BOOM 2016 TICKETS

Je kan op twee manieren je Boom ticket aanschaffen 

-    Online: Bezoek onze website en koop hier je online ticket. 
-    Boom Ambassadeurs: In meer dan 50 landen zijn kaarten te koop via ons Boom Ambassadeur netwerk.
 
Tarieven per land

We hebben verschillende ticketprijzen die zijn gebaseerd op economische situatie van landen. 

Friendly Price (Vriendelijke Prijs)

We hebben ook een Friendly Price voor mensen die in zogenoemde ontwikkelingslanden wonen. De lijst van ontwikkelingslanden en –regio’s is als volgt:
• Griekenland;
• Afrika; 
• het Midden-Oosten, Azië, de Pacific, exclusief Australië, Israël, Japan, Nieuw- Zeeland, Oman, Qatar en de Verenigde Arabische Emiraten;
• Mexico, Caraïben, Centraal- en Zuid Amerika;
• Centraal- en Oost-Europa: Albanië, Armenië, Azerbeidzjan, Belarus, Bosnië, Bulgarije, Kroatië, Tsjechië, Estland, Georgië, Hongarije, Kazachstan, Kirgizië, Letland, Litouwen, Macedonië, Montenegro, Moldavië, Roemenië, Rusland, Servië, Slowakije, Slovenië, Tadzjikistan, Turkije, Turkmenistan, Oekraïne, Oezbekistan.

Friendly price tickets kunnen niet geruild worden en zijn alleen beschikbaar bij lokale ambassadeurs. Om gebruik te maken van deze korting, zal je lokale ambassadeur vragen om bewijs van je woonplaats.**
 

GRATIS BOOM TICKET 

Japan

TICKETS 

Check www.boomfestival.org en klik op „Tickets“.
