BOOM FESTIVAL, MESAJ UNIVERSAL

BOOM nu este doar un festival, este o experienta a transformarii pentru a construi o noua cultura.

Boom oglindeste schimbarile evolutiei universului dezvoltand o experienta unica care include placerea de a fi in natura, neotribalismul, printre cele mai bune stiluri de muzica contemporana, prelegeri pentru stimualrea mintii sustinute de activisti la nivel global si inspira prin arte fine.

Boom aderă la principiul de "gândire neconventionala", reflectând moduri noi de a ne exprima prin unificarea alternativa si cultura psihedelica a lumii. Este o experiență timp de o săptămână departe de cultura dominantă în ținuturile însorite Portugheze liber-nuclear virgine.

Tu esti principalul motiv pentru Boom - the Boomer!

INTERCULTURAL

Noi suntem tribul unit al lumii si aceasta este o adunare interculturala plina de culoare!

Prieteni din mai mult de 151 de tari diferite se unesc pentru a vizualiza si manifesta o vizune pozitiva pentru viitor. Este un Paradis in cosmosul unei noi culturi planetare in care ne lasam in urma prejudecatile si obligatiile determinismului cultural. Noi suntem Unul!
 


 

NATURA SI PLAJA

La Boom timpul pare ca se opreste... Boom are loc intr-un paradis natural inconjurat de copaci iberici vechi de secole, de gradini jucause si un lac curat care reflecta magia lunii pline, muntii si un incredibil peisaj panoramic.La tarmul aparent infinit al lacului stralucitor, simte libertatea de a te incalzi intins pe plaja si a te bucura de soarele Portughez intrand in starea de spirit contemplativ, pozitiva si relaxanta . Multumim Pamantului Sacru pentru acest cadou minunat! Va rugam respectati-l!
 

CUNOASTERE

Liminal Village este centrul cultural al Festivalului. Începând cu anul 2000 Boom a invitat unii dintre activiștii  si gânditorii cei mai activi atât din cultura psihedelică cat și din cea alternativă. Cu prelegeri și discuții pe teme la fel de diverse ca activismul, psihedelica, spații culturale libere, ritualuri ancestrale, mitologie, ecologie, peisaje onirice, permacultura, trance, plante sacre și științe alternative - la Liminal Village am afirmat realitatea unei noi culturi planetare in drumul ce duce spre anul 2016.

Cativa invitati care au participat sunt Vandana Shiva, Alex Grey, Daniel Pinchbeck, Graham Hancock, Tony Andrews, Romio Shesthra, Robert Venosa, Erik Davis, shipibo Don Guillermo Arevalo

Nu ratați de asemenea grădinile, galeriile de arta si Paradigm Films în 2016 , un program de filme al noii culturi planetare.

MUZEUL DE ARTA PSIHEDELICA

Acesta este portalul cel mai creativ si stimulant al Festivalului Boom.

Artiști vizionari și pictori se strang laolalta venind din fiecare continent, contribuind astfel unei colecții uimitoare de opere de artă pentru o expoziție surprinzatoare, care oferă mai multe platforme de exprimare - ce depășesc percepțiile și deblocheaza canalele de creativitate.

INSTALATII ARTISTICE

Arta oferă acces direct catre planurile profunde ale existenței noastre, ne duce într-o călătorie care ne afecteaza in moduri in care muzica nu o face. La fel de bine ca și in pictura, sculptura, arta de teren, sau video, ne aventurăm dincolo de limitele perceptiei, cu o selecție de zeci de instalații artistice realizate de cei mai buni artiști din lume care creează o experiență sinestezica, experienta psihedelică, conferind o schimbare profunda în mintea umana. Conecteaza-te, abandoneaza-te si lasa-te fermecat!
 

MUZICA

Repartizate pe un număr distinct de scene diferite , Boom reprezinta o adunare a mintilor deschise mișcării psihedelice. Axat pe dezvaluitea delicatetei muzicii underground unei mulțimi internaționale, experiența Festivalului Boom este despre conectare și nu se bazează doar pe un line up. Peisajele noastre sonore cuprind genuri bazate pe inspirații psihedelice si se extind spre ambient, psytrance, dub, world music, space si dub-techno, bass music, glitch, nu-funk, progressive, IDM, neo-trance, cosmic, si psybreaks. Contecteaza-te cu fagasul iubirii!
 

DANCE TEMPLE

Acesta este inima Festivalului Boom ! Dance Temple este o zonă futurista de dans tribal ce ne uneste cu spiritul universal al transei psihedelice . Pentru a ne conecta cu sensul transformativ al anului 2016, ii invitam pe cei mai buni  DJ , live acts și grupurile tribale sa mixeze seturi lungi pentru o experiență profundă de transa – eliminand astfel noțiunea de cantitate deasupra calitatii. Aici ne hrănim dragostea colectivă pentru diversitatea transei și ne angajam într- o aventură ce exploreaza dimensiunile complicate ale muzicii iar pentru a mentiona doar cateva genuri ele ar fi: psy, dark, twilight, forest, tribal, prog, full-on, fusion, groovy full-on, Goa si nu-Goa.

Boom nu este condus de ideea asa numitului " star- system ", sau că line- up-ul face festivalul . Dimpotrivă , acesta deviază de la domeniul egoist , exercitând un omagiu experienței de colaborare cu muzicienii , DJ-ii, VJ-ii , decoratorii , designerii și cel mai important , publicul - fiecare canalizand o forță creatoare pentru transcendența colectiva prin dansul tuturor ființelor vii.

MEDIUL INCONJURATOR

Programul Ecologic al Festivalului Boom aplică principiile permaculturii chiar pe intreg festivalului. Acesta a obtinut premiul Greener Festival Award Outstanding  pentru de cel mai ecologic festival in 2008, 2010, 2012, Premiul European Festival 2010 sau Premiul Green Inspiration 2012, demonstrând ca este intr-adevar posibil sa creezi intruniri umane care respectă Pământul Sacru.

Noi folosim WC-uri 100% bio, tratam 100% din apă cu ajutorul plantelor și oferim scrumiere de buzunar gratuite, folosim ulei vegetal de deșeuri în generatoare și producem mai multa apă, ECOTEAM, energie solară, salubritate, moară de vânt și soluții bazate pe bio-constructii. Vino și alătură-te fraților și surorilor tale și descopera noi modalități de a trăi in armonie cu mediul.

NU LASA URME!

SPIRITUALITATE

La Boom, promovam ideea de activism social spiritual cu un program vast de vindecare, yoga, ayurveda, tai chi, kung fu, Watsu, terapii și învățături holistice; trezindu-ti ființa spirituală și hrănindu-ti bunăstarea pentru a spori și manifesta valorile universale și ajutand astfel la implementarea schimbărilor sociale. Suntem cu Toții!
 

FACILITATI

Apă gratuit, camping gratuit, parc de rulote gratuit. Baby Boom pentru mini-Boomers (adu-ti familia la Boom!). Asistență medicală gratuită. Serviciul de transfer cu autobuzul din aeroporturile din Lisabona și Madrid. WC-uri 100% bio. dusuri tratate 100% cu plante. Farmacie Ayurveda. Facilități speciale pentru persoanele cu handicap. Magazin alimentar. Bucătărie comuna, și multe multe altele!
 

NO LOGO

Boom este si a fost intotdeauna independent de sponsorizarile corporatiste si se auto-finanteaza prin vanzarea biletelor. Suntem un festival neinfluentat de corporatiile multinationale, o zona a libertatii cognitive care din 1997 s-a dezvoltat spontan transmitandu-se din gura in gura. Echipa Boom isi dedica eforturile in crearea unui univers paralel unde tu esti cea mai importanta parte. Fa ca schimbarea sa se produca!
 

NEVOI SPECIALE

Dorim să îmbunătățim facilitățile pentru persoanele cu handicap. Dacă aveți sau unul dintre prietenii dumneavoastra au dizabilitati, va rugam sa ne trimiteti un e-mail până in iunie 2016 pentru a le acorda condiții speciale: specialneeds@boomfestival.org

PRET FRIENDLY

Avem de asemenea un preț Friendly pentru persoanele care trăiesc în țările în curs de dezvoltare. Lista de țări și regiuni în curs de dezvoltare se prezintă astfel:

multilingual\/suomi\/.body:
BOOM FESTIVAALIEN SANOMA

Boomit eivät ole pelkkä festivaali. Boom on käänteentekevä, mullistava elämys halki uudenlaisen kulttuurin. 
Elämme muutosten aikoja. Luonnosta nauttimisen, yhteisöllisyyden, aivan omaa tasoaan olevan musiikin, päräyttävien luentojen sekä mitä kauneimman taiteen tuoman inspiraation mahdollistama kokemusten kirjo tuo näkökulmaa tähän muutokseen. 
Boomeissa on kyse metsän näkemisestä puilta. Boomeilla vaihtoehtoiset ja psykedeeliset kulttuurit ympäri maailman yhdistyvät mahdollistaen uudenlaisen itsensä toteuttamisen avarakatseisessa ympäristössä. Reilu viikko Portugalin koskemattomalla ja aurinkoisella maaperällä irti vallitsevasta yhteiskunnasta on tosiaankin kokemus. 
Olet isoin syy näiden juhlien pitämiseen.

MONIKULTTUURISUUS

Olemme samaa heimoa kulttuureistamme riippumatta. Boomeilla on tämän yhteisen heimon tapaaminen, jossa ystävät yli 151 maasta yhdistävät energiansa yhteisen positiivisen tulevaisuuden puolesta. Boom on uuden planetaarisen kulttuurin kosminen satama, kunhan unohdamme kaikki yhteiskuntamme oletukset ja ennakkoluulot siitä, mitä me ihmisinä olemme, tai mitä meidän tulisi olla. Olemme kaikki yhtä!


 

LUONTO JA RANTA

Täällä aika menettää merkityksensä... Boomit järjestetään vuorien ympäröimässä paratiisissa, jonka kruunaa koskematon järvi ja siitä heijastuva täysikuu. Olet vapaa lekottelemaan ja uimaan helmeilevän järven rannalla ja kylpemään Portugalin auringossa, vaipuen rentoon, mietiskelevään ja positiiviseen mielentilaan. Olemme kiitollisia Maalle tästä ihanasta lahjasta. Kunnioittakaamme sitä!
 

TIETOISUUS

The Liminal Village on Boomien sivistyksen kehto. Vuodesta 2000 Boom on kutsunut aikamme aktiivisimpia ajattelijoita ja aktivisteja sekä psykedeelisen että vaihoehtokulttuurien saralta.  Luentoja ja keskusteluja on niinkin monenlaisista teemoista kuin aktivismi, psykedelia, vapaat kulttuurialueet, esihistorialliset riitit, mytologia, ekologia, unisiepparit, permakulttuuri, transsi, hengelliset kasvit ja vaihtoehtotieteet - Liminal Villagessa olemme vahvistaneet uuden planetaarisen kulttuurin realistisuutta matkallamme kohti vuotta 2016. Joitakin osallistuneita vierailijoita ovat olleet Vandana Shiva, Alex Grey, Daniel Pinchbeck, Graham Hancock, Tony Andrews, Romio Shesthra, Robert Venosa, Erik Davis sekä shipibo Don Quillermo Arevalo.
Näe myös puutarhat ja Paragim Films 2016 - päivittäisessä ohjelmassa on elokuvia joissa kuvaajat syventyvät ajankohtaisiin nykykulttuurin suoltamiin paradigmoihin.

PSYKEDEELISEN TAITEEN MUSEO

Tämä saa aistisi herkistymään. Visionääriset taiteilijat ja maalarit ympäri maailman kantavat kortensa kekoon seurauksena tajunnan räjäyttävä kokoelma taidetta eri ilmaisukeinoin. Psykedeelinen taide murtaa pinttyneitä käsityksiämme ja saa luovuuden kanavamme virtaamaan.

INSTALLAATIOTAIDE

Taiteella on yhteys olemassaolomme syvimpiin kysymyksiin. Se vie meidät vaellukselle joka vaikuttaa meihin tavalla, johon musiikki ei yllä. Kuten maalauksissa, veistoksissa, maataiteessa ja videoissakin, me matkaamme rajojen yli uudelle taiteen alueelle lukuisten taideinstallaatioiden siivittäminä. Linnunradan taitavimmat ja kekseliäimmät artistit tarjoavat esteettisiä, psykedeelisiä kokemuksia joiden voima yltää jopa alitajuntaamme. Virittäydy tunnelmaan, ja anna mennä!
 

MUSIIKKI

Levittäytyneenä selkeästi eri tyylisille tanssilattioille, Boom on avomielinen psykedeelisen musiikin koti, jossa keskitytään paljastamaan valtavirrasta poikkeavan musiikin herkkuja isommalle yleisölle. Boom-kokemuksessa ei ole kuitenkaan kyse vain soitetuista kappaleista, vaan niitä kuuntelevien ihmisten välisestä yhteydestä. Äänimaisemamme koostuu psykedeliaan pohjautuvista genreistä, kuten ambient, psytrance, dub, maailman musiikki, space- ja dubtechno, bassomusiikki, glitch, nu-funk, proge, IDM, neo-trance, cosmic ja psybreaks.
 

DANCE TEMPLE

Boomien sydän. Tanssin temppeli on futuristinen rakennelma, jossa heimo kokoontuu yhtymään henkisesti psykedeelisen trancen hengessä. Karistaaksemme erillisyyden illuusion 2016-vuoden teemaan kuuluvasti, kutsumme parhaat DJ:t, live-setit ja heimokkaat yhtyeet soittamaan pidempiä keikkoja syvemmän transsin saavuttamiseksi - laatu ja määrä ovat avainasemassa. Täällä ravitsemme yhteistä rakkauttamme trancen monimuotoisuutta kohtaan ja astumme seikkailuun joka vie meidät psyn, darkin, twilightin, forestin, tribalin, progen, full-onin, fusionin, grooven full-onin, Goan ja nu-Goan, vain muutamia mainitakseni, konstikkaisiin ulottuvuuksiin. 
Boomeilla yksikään artisti ei ole ylitse muiden, emmekä pyri saavuttamaan suosiota muutamalla suurella nimellä. Päinvastoin, pyrimme pois itsekeskeisyydestä, paneutuen yhtäläiseen kunnianosoitukseen jokaista muusikkoa, DJ:tä, VJ:tä, dekottajaa, suunnittelijaa ja mikä tärkeintä, jokaista festivaalikävijää kohtaan -jokainen kanavoiden omaa energiaansa tässä käsityskyvyn ylittävässä elämän tanssissa. 

YMPÄRISTÖ

Boomin ympäristösuunnittelussa sovelletaan Permakulttuurisia arvoja. Olemme saaneet tunnustusta monelta saralta; Outstanding Greener Festival Award 2008, 2010, 2012, European Festival Award 2010 ja Green Inspiration Award 2012. Boomit ovat todiste siitä, että on täysin mahdollista järjestää suuriakin kokoontumisia ja samalla kunnioittaa arvokasta Maatamme. 
Käytämme täysin kompostoituva vessoja, puhdistamme veden kasveja käyttämällä, jaamme ilmaiseksi taskutuhkakuppeja, käytämme jätekasvirasvaa generaattoreissa ja kehitämme lukuisia vesi-, EcoTeam-, aurinkoenergia-, saniteetti-, tuulimylly ja bioarkkitehtuuripohjaisia menetelmiä. Tule, liity veljiisi ja siskoihisi ja löydä uusia tapoja elää ympäristön kanssa.
JÄLKIÄ JÄTTÄMÄTTÄ!

HENGELLISYYS

Olemme pioneereja hengellisen sosiaalisen aktivismin saralla. Boomeilla ohjelmaan kuuluu laaja kirjo hiilausta, joogaa, ayurvedaa, tai chitä, kung fua, watsua, terapioita ja holistisia opetuksia. Herättämällä henkisyyden itsessäsi ja haalimalla hyvinvointia kasvatat ja tuot julki universaaleja arvoja ja edesautat sosiaalisen muutoksen tapahtumista. Kaikki olemme Me. 
 

PALVELUT

Ilmainen vesi, ilmainen leirintä ja ilmainen paikka asuntovaunuille- ja autoille. Baby Boom perheen pienimmille (koko perhe Boomeille!). Ilmainen terveysapu. Säilytyskaapit. Boom Bus-yhteiskuljetus Lissabonin ja Madridin lentokentiltä. 100% kompostoivat vessat. 100% bio-puhdistetun veden suihkut. Ayurveda-hoitoa. Erityispalveluita niitä tarvitseville. Ruokakauppa. Yhteiskeittiö ja paljon, paljon muuta!!
 

KORPORAATIOIDEN LOGOISTA VAPAA ALUE

Boom on, ja tulee aina olemaan, täysin vapaa yhtiöiden tuista ja täysin rahoitettu pelkästään lipunmyynnillä. Olemme yhtiö-vapaa festivaali, kognitiivisen vapauden vyöhyke, joka on kasvanut kasvamistaan vuodesta 1997. Me, Boom-jengi, annamme kaikkemme luodaksemme rinnakkaisen todellisuuden, jonka tärkein osa on sinä itse. Ole Muutos.
 

ERITYISTARPEET

Haluamme kehittyä erityispalveluiden tarjoamisessa niitä tarvitseville. Jos sinä tai ystäväsi olette erityisen tuen tai avun tarpeessa esimerkiksi fyysisen vamman takia, olkaa hyvät ja lähettäkää meille sähköpostia kesäkuuhun 2016 mennessä osoitteeseen: specialneeds@boomfestival.org

 

BOOM 2016 LIPUNMYYNTI

Voit ostaa Boom-lippusi kahdella eri tavalla, hyödyntämällä
-Nettiä: Vieraile nettisivuillamme ja hanki nettilippu;
-Boom-lähettilästä, eli Boom Ambassadoria: Lippuja on saatavilla yli 50 maassa Boom Ambassador-verkoston kautta

Hinnat ovat maakohtaisia
Hinnat vaihtelevat kunkin maan taloudellisen tilanteen mukaan.

Kaverihinnat
Kehittyvissä maissa asuville on myös omat Kaverihintansa. Kaverihintaiseen lippuun ovat oikeutettuja seuraavien maiden tai alueiden asukkaat:
Afrikka;
Lähi-Itä, Aasia ja Tyynenmeren valtiot (ei koske Australiaa, Israelia, Uutta Seelantia, Omania, Qataria ja Arabiemiraatteja)
Meksiko, Karibia, Väli- ja Etelä-Amerikka;
Keski- ja Itä-Eurooppa: Albania, Armenia, Azerbaidzan, Valko-Venäjä, Bosnia, Bulgaria, Kroatia, Tsekkoslovakia, Viro, Georgia, Unkari, Kazakstan, Kirgisia, Latvia, Liettua, Makedonia, Montenegro, Moldova, Romania, Venäjä, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Tadzikistan, Turkki, Turkmenistan, Ukraina, Uzbekistan
Kaverihintaisia lippuja ei voi palauttaa ja niitä saa vain paikallisen Boom-lähettilään kautta. Saadaksesi alennuksen, sinun tulee todistaa kansalaisuutesi lähettiläälle. 

ILMAINEN LIPPU BOOMEILLE
Japania

BOOM FESTIVAL - ETT UNIVERSELLT BUDSKAP!!

Boom är inte bara en festival, det är en transformerande upplevelse för att bygga upp en ny kultur. Boom spegel de förändringar som utvecklas i universum genom att framkalla en unik upplevelse som inkluderar njutningen av naturen, neo - tribalism, urval av vår bästa samtida musik, mind - stimulerande föreläsningar av globala aktivister och inspiration av den finaste konsten.
Boom följer principen "tänka utanför boxen", vilket återspeglar nya sätt att uttrycka oss själva, genom att ena den alternativa och psykedeliska kulturen i världen. Det är en veckolång upplevelse långt ifrån den dominerande kulturen i den soliga portugisiska orörda och kärnvapenfria omgivningen.
Du är den främsta orsaken till Boom - Boomern!

INTERKULTURELL

Vi är den förenade världsstammen och det här är en färgrik, interkulturell sammankomst! Vänner från mer än 151 olika länder samlas för att visualisera och manifestera en positiv vision för framtiden. Det är en oas i världsalltet för en ny jordisk kultur där vi lämnar våra fördomar och bördan av kulturell determinism bakom oss. We Are One!


 

NATUR OCH STRAND

På Boom känns det som att tiden står stilla… Boom hålls inom ett naturparadis inbäddat av hundraåriga Iberiska träd, lekfulla trädgårdar och en orörd sjö som speglar den magiska fullmånen, bergen och ett otroligt panoramalandskap. Vid stranden av den nästan oändliga glittrande sjön, känn friheten av att få sola på stranden och njuta av den portugisiska solen för en vilsam, kontemplativ, avkopplande och positiv stämning. Vi tackar den heliga jorden för denna vackra gåva. Vänligen respektera den!

KUNSKAP

Liminal Village är Booms kulturella nav. Sedan år 2000 har Boom bjudit in några av de mest aktiva tänkarna och aktivisterna från både den psykedeliska och alternativa kulturen. Med föreläsningar och samtal om teman så varierande som aktivism, psychedelia, fria kulturutrymmen, släkt- riter, mytologi, ekologi, Dreamscapes, permakultur, trance, heliga växter och alternativ vetenskap - i Liminal Village har vi bekräftat verkligheten av en ny planetär kultur på väg till 2016.
Några tidigare gäster som har deltagit är Vandana Shiva, Alex Grey, Daniel Pinchbeck, Graham Hancock, Tony Andrews, Romio Shesthra, Robert Venosa, Erik Davis och shipibo Don Guillermo Arevalo.
Det finns också trädgårdar och Paradigm Films 2016 - ett veckolångt program av filmer där filmfotografer utforskar ett brett utbud av de senaste paradigmskiftena, motsatta vad den dominerande kulturen predikar för oss.

PSYKEDELISKT KONST MUSEUM

Detta är en av Booms mest kreativa och stimulerande portaler. Visionära konstnärer och målare samlas från alla kontinenter och bidrar med en fantastisk samling av konstverk för en otrolig utställning av konst som presenterar flera plattformar av uttryck - som överskrider uppfattningen och låser upp kanaler av kreativitet.

KONST INSTALLATIONER

Konst ger direkt tillgång till dem djupare planen av vår existens, tar med oss på en resa som påverkar oss på ett sätt som musiken inte kan. Förutom med måleri, skulptur, land art, eller video, vågar vi utanför gränserna till en ny terräng med ett urval av dussintals konstinstallationer från de finaste och mest uppfinningsrika artisterna i kosmos, som skapar en synaesthetic, psykedelisk upplevelse och överför en kraftfull förändring djupt in i det mänskliga psyket. Tune in and drop out!

MÜZIK

Spridda över ett antal helt olika scener, representerar Boom en öppen och fördomsfri samling av den psykedeliska rörelsen. Fokuserad på att avtäcka delikatessen av underground-musik för en internationell publik, handlar Boom-upplevelsen om samhörighet och bygger inte bara på spelschemat. Våra ljudlandskap omfattar genrer baserade på psykedelisk inspiration som spänner från ambient, psytrance, dub, världsmusik, space- och dub-techno, bass musik, glitch, nu-funk, progressiv, IDM, neo-trance, cosmic, och psybreaks. Anslut till love groovet!

DANS TEMPLET

Detta är Booms hjärtslag! Dansens Tempel är ett futuristiskt tribal-dans område som förenar oss med den universella anden av psykedelisk trance. För att anknyta oss till den transformerande meningen av 2016 bjuder vi in de finaste DJ:s, liveakter och tribal band att spela längre set för en djupare trance upplevelse - och i processen avskaffa begreppet kvantitet framför kvalitet. Här vårdar vi vår kollektiva kärlek till den mångfald av trance som finns och påbörjar ett äventyr som utforskar dem intrikata dimensionerna av psy, dark, twilight, forest, tribal, prog, full-on, fusion, groovy full-on, Goa och nu-Goa bara för att nämna några. Boom är inte driven av tanken av ett så kallat "star-system" eller kändis line-up som en del festivaler gör. Tvärtom avviker Boom från sfären av egoism och hyllar den samarbetsupplevelse skapad av musiker, DJ:s , VJ:s, dekoratörer, formgivare och viktigast av allt, besökarna - var och en kanaliserar en kreativ kraft för den kollektiva transcendensen genom dans av alla levande varelser.

MILJÖ

Booms miljöprogram tillämpar permakultur principerna på hela festivalen. Detta har uppmärksammats och belönats med Outstanding Greener Festival Award 2008, 2010, och 2012, European Festival Award 2010 och Green Inspiration Award 2012, vilket tydligt visar hur det är möjligt att skapa mänskliga möten som respekterar den Heliga Jorden.
Vi använder 100 % komposteringstoaletter, vi behandlar 100 % av vattnet med hjälp av växter och delar ut gratis fick-askkoppar, vi använder vegetabilisk avfallsolja i generatorerna och vi utvecklar flera vatten, EcoTeam, solenergi, sanitets, väderkvarns och bioconstruction-baserade lösningar. Anslut dig till dina bröder och systrar och upptäck nya positiva sätt att leva tillsammans med naturen.
LÄMNA INGA SPÅR!

ANDLIGHET

På Boom banar vi väg för idén om andlig social aktivism med ett omfattande program av healing, yoga, ayurveda, tai chi, kung fu, watsu, behandlingar och holistiska läror. Väck ditt andliga väsen och vårda ditt välbefinnande för att förstora och manifestera universella värden och hjälpa till att genomföra sociala förändringar. Vi är alla en.

ANORDNINGAR

Gratis vatten, gratis camping, fri husvagnspark. Baby Boom för mini Boomers (ta med din familj till Boom!). Gratis medicinsk hjälp. Säkerhets skåp. Boom Buss transfer från Lissabons och Madrids flygplatser. 100 % komposteringstoaletter. 100 % duschar som behandlats med växter. Ayurveda apotek. Speciella faciliteter för handikappade. Livsmedelsbutik. Gemenskaps kök, och mycket, mycket mer!

INGEN FÖRETAGSSPONSRING

Boom är, och kommer alltid att vara, helt fri från företagssponsring och finansieras enbart av biljettförsäljning. Vi är en bolagsfritt driven festival, en zon av kognitiv frihet som har vuxit organiskt genom mun till mun sedan 1997. Boomteamet ägnar sina ansträngningar åt att skapa ett parallellt universum där du är den viktigaste delen. Gå ut och gör skillnad!

SÄRSKILDA BEHOV

Vi vill förbättra möjligheterna för funktions- och rörelsehindrade. Om du eller någon av dina vänner är funktions- eller rörelsehindrad, skicka ett mail till oss senast innan juni 2016 för att möjliggöra särskilda villkor för dem: specialneeds@boomfestival.org

 

BOOM 2016 BILJETTER

Du kan köpa din Boom biljett på två olika sätt:
Online: Besök vår hemsida och få din online-biljett;
Boom Ambassadörer: Vi har biljetter tillgängliga i fler än 50 länder genom vårt Boom ambassadörs nätverk.
 
Särskilda priser för varje land
Vi har olika biljettpriser som bygger på de ekonomiska skillnaderna i varje land.
 
Vänskapspris
Vi har också ett vänskapspris för människor som lever i utvecklingsländer. Förteckning över utvecklingsländer och regioner är följande:
• Afrika;
• Mellanöstern, Asien och Stillahavsområdet, med undantag av Australien, Israel, Nya Zeeland, Oman, Qatar och Förenade Arabemiraten;
• Mexiko, Karibien, Central- och Sydamerika;
• Central- och Östeuropa: Albanien, Armenien, Azerbajdzjan, Bielorussia, Bosnien, Bulgarien, Kroatien, Tjeckien, Estland, Georgien, Ungern, Kazakstan, Kirgizistan, Lettland, Litauen, Makedonien, Montenegro, Moldavien, Rumänien, Ryssland, Serbien, Slovakien, Slovenien, Tadzjikistan, Turkiet, Turkmenistan, Ukraina, och Uzbekistan.
Vänskapspris biljetter är inte överlåtbara och kan bara köpas av ambassadörerna i varje land. Dem går inte att köpa online. För att få denna rabatt, kommer din lokala ambassadör kräva att du visar bevis på nationell hemvist. Du behöver visa ditt pass vid entré till festivalen. **
 
GRATIS BOOM BILJETT

Japan

BOOM FESTIVAL, EVRENSEL BIR MESAJ

Boom sadece bir festival degil, yeni bir kültürün olusumunda dönüsümsel bir tecrübedir.

Boom evrende ki gelisimi, doga, yeni-kabilecilik, çagdas müzik, küresel aktivistler tarafindan verilen ufuk açici konseranslar ve güzel sanatlardan ilham alip, essiz bir deneyim ile gelistirip gözetler.

Boom “genis bir perspektiften bakmak/kaliplarin disinda düsünmek” prensibine bagli kalir, kendimizi ifade etmeyi , dünya üzerinde ki alternatif ve psychedelic kültür ile alisilmisin disinda olan yollar ile yansitir. Bir haftalik baskin kültürden uzak Portekizin günesli, bozulmamis, nükleer maddelerden arindirilmis topraklarinda olan bir deneyim.

Boom için asil neden sensin – Boomer!

KÜLTÜRLERARASI

Biz Dünyada ki birlesik kabileyiz ve bu da rengarenk, kültürlerarasi bir bulusma. Katilimcilar, 116 farkli ülkeden, görsellestirme ve gelecek için tek, pozitif bir vizyon ortaya koymak amaciyla birlesmektedir. Bu bizim önyargilarimizi ve kültürel belirlemecilik dayatmalarini arkamizda biraktigimiz yeni gezegensel kültürün evren içinde ki cenneti.
Hepimiz Biriz!


 

DOGA VE KUMSAL

Boomdayken, zaman durmus gibi gelicek.  Boom, asirlik Iber agaçlari ile dolu, bozulmamis, dolunayin sihrini yansitan bir göl, daglar ve olaganüstü bir manzarayla çevrelenmis dogal bir cennet içerisindedir. Piril piril sonsuz gibi bir gölün kiyilarinda, kumsalda özgürce güneslenmeyi hissedip, tasasizca Portekizin gün isiginin tadini çikartip, uzun uzun düsüncelere dalabilir, rahatlayabilir ve potizif bir ruh haline bürünebilirsiniz. Bu güzel hediye için Kutsal Topraklara sükrediyoruz. 
Lütfen sizde saygi duyun.

BILGI

Boom’un kültürel merkezi Liminal Village’dir. Boom, 2000 yilindan bu yana, psychedelic ve alternatif kültürden, en bilinen aktif düsünürleri ve aktivistleri davet etmektedir. Farkli türlerden aktivizm, psychedelia, özgür kültürel alanlar, ata ayinleri, mitoloji, ekoloji, düsvari sahneler, kalici tarim, trans, kutsal bitkler ve alternatif bilim gibi temalar üzerine konferanslar ve konusmalarla 2016 üzerinde, Liminal Village ‘de yeni bir gezensel kültürün gerçekligini kesfediyor olacagiz. 

Katilan bazi misafirler; Vandana Shiva, Alex Grey, Daniel Pinchbeck, Graham Hancock, Tony Andrews, Romio Shesthra, Robert Venosa, Erik Davis, shipibo Don Guillermo Arevalo. 

Ayrica, yönetmenlerin, egemen kültürün bize ögütlediklerine karsi olan yeni paradigmalari kesfettigi, bir hafta süren Paradigm Films 2016 yer alicak.

PSYCHEDELIC SANAT GALERISI

Burasi Boom’un en yaratici ve ufuk açici portallarindan biridir.  Her kitadan vizyoner sanatçilar ve ressamlar biraraya gelip, akillara durgunluk veren bir sergi için çarpiçi sanat eserlerinden olusan koleksiyonlariyla anlatimini birden çok platformda sunarak katkida bulunurlar - alginin sinirlarini ve yaraticiligin kanallarinin kilitlerini çözmektedirler.

SANATSAL ENSTALASYONLAR

Sanat, varolusumuzun en derin düzlemine direkt olarak erisim saglar, bizi müzigin yapamacagi sekilde etkili bir yolculuga çikarir. Resim, heykel, arazi sanati yada videonun yani sira,evrende ki en iyi ve en özgün sanatçilardan seçilmis düzinelerce sanatsal enstalasyon ile duyum ikililigi, psychedelic tecrübe yaratir, derin ve güçlü degisimini insan akli dahilinde açiga vurur, sinirlarin ötesinde, alisilmisin disinda olan yerlerin içine dogru bir yolculuga gitmeye cesaret ederiz.
Konsantre olun ve kendinizi birakin.

MÜZIK

Boom, bir dizi belirgin biçimde farkli asamalarda yayilmis, açik görüslü psychedelic-hareket toplulugunu sunmaktadir. Uluslararasi bir kalabaliga,underground müzigin mezesini açiga çikarmaya odaklanmistir. Boom deneyimi baglanilabilirlik ile ilgilidir , sadece line-up'in üzerine kurulu degildir. Ses algimiz, pychedelic ilhamina dayali ambient, psytrance, dub, world music, space and dub-techno, bass music, glitch, nu-funk, progressive, IDM, neo-trance, cosmic, ve psybreaks'i kapsayan türler ile çevrilmistir
Sizi ritm askiyla birlestirir.  

DANS MABEDI

Burasi, Boom’un kalbinin attigi yer. Dans mabedi, evrensel psychedelic trans ruhuyla bizi futuristic kabile dans alaninda birlestirir. 2016 ’ün bizi dönüsümsel anlaminda birlestirmesi için en iyi DJleri davet ediyoruz, canli performanslar ve derin bir trans tecrübesi için tribal gruplar uzunca setler çalacaklar – nicelikten ziyade niteligin kavrami, bu süreçte ortadan kaldirilacak.

Psy, dark, twilight, forest, tribali, prog, full-on, fusion, groovy full-on, Goa ve nu-Goa  isimlendirmek için sadece birkaç tanesi;  burada trance müziginin çesitliligi için ortak sevgimizi büyütüyor ve iç içe geçen boyutlarin kesfine çikan bir maceraya atiliyoruz. 

Boom, sözde “Yildiz-Sistemi” düsüncesi tarafindan sürdürülen yada sadece line-uplardan olusan bir festival degildir. Aksine Müzisyenlerin Dj’lerin, VJ’lerin, dekoratörlerin,tasarimcilarin ve en önemlisi toplulugun kollektif deneyimini yücelterek, yasayan tüm canlilarin birlikteliginin coskusunu, dansin olusturdugu yaratici akisin gücü ile ortaya koyar ve egotizmin hükmünden siyrilir. 

ÇEVRE

Boom Çevre Programi, festivalde kalici tarim prensiplerini uygular. 2008,2010,2012 yillari Outstanding Greener Festival Ödülü, 2010 Avrupa Festivalleri Ödülü yada 2012 Green Inspiration Ödülleri ile geçerliligi Kabul edilmistir. Insan topluluklarin nasil kutsal topraklara saygi göstermesi, yaratilan insan toplulugunun gerçekten kutsal topraklara duydugu sayginin nasil mümkün oldugunun gösterilisidir.
100% kompost tuvalettler kullaniyoruz, suyu bitkileri kullanarak %100 olarak isliyoruz, ücretsiz olarak cep kül tablasi veriyoruz, atik bitki yaglarini jeneratorlerde kullaniyoruz ve birkaç su, EcoTeam, günes enerjisi, sihhi tesisat, rüzgar gülü ve biyo-yapi çözümleri gelistiriyoruz. Gelin ve kardeslerinize katilip pozitif yasavan bir çevreyi yeni yollarla kesfedin.
IZ BIRAKMAYIN!

RUHSALLIK

Boomda, düsünsel sosyal aktivizm düsüncesini engin bir iyilestirme programiyla, yoga, ayurveda, tai chi, kung-fu, watsu, terapiler ve bütünsel ögretilere öncülük ediyoruz. Ruhsal varolusunuzun uyanisinda, refahinizi besleyerek büyütmek için, evrensel manifesto degerlerini ve sosyal degisimin uygulanmasina yardimci olmaktadir. Hepimiz biriz.

IMKANLAR

Ücretsiz su, ücretsiz kamp alani, ücretsiz karavan parki. Mini-Boomerlar için bebek boom alani(ailenizi Boom'a getirebilirsiniz!). Ücretsiz medikal asistanlik, kilitli kasalar. Lisbon ve Madrid havaalanindan Boom-otobüs gidis-gelis seferleri. 100% kompost tuvaletler, 100% bitkilerle islenmis duslar. Ayurveda eczanesi. Engelliler için özel imkanlar/olanaklar,market, ortak mutfak ve çok daha fazlasi!!

REKLAMSIZ ALAN

Boom, tamamen firmalarin sponsorlugundan arinmistir , sadece bilet satislarindan finanse edilmektedir ve hep bu sekilde devam edicektir.  Boom olarak firmalardan serbest bir festivaliz, kavramsal bir özgürlük bölgesi olarak organik bir sekilde 1997’den bu yana agizdan agiza büyümüstür. 

Boom ekibi tüm çabasini sizin en önemli kisminda yer aldiginiz parallel bir evren yaratmaya adamistir.

Degisimi mümkün kilin.

ÖZEL IHTIYAÇLAR

Engelliler için olan tesisleri gelistirmek istiyoruz. Eger siz veya bir arkadasiniz engelli ise, lütfen bize Haziran 2016 tarihine kadar e-posta gönderin ki onlar için özel sartlari olusturalim.

 

BOOM 2016 BILETLERI

Boom biletlerini iki yoldan satin alabilirsiniz;
-    Online : Web sitemizi ziyaret ederek online bilet alabilirsiniz
-    Boom Elçileri : 50den fazla ülkede ki Boom Elçilikleri agindan mevcut biletleri alabilirsiniz.

Her Ülke Için Özel Fiyat
Her ülkenin ekonomik farkliliklarina göre degisik bilet ücretlendirmemiz bulunmaktadir.

Dost Ülke Ücretleri
Gelismekte olarak adlandirilmis ülkeler için ayrica Dost Ülke Fiyati bulunmaktadir.
Asagida gelismekte olan ülkelerin ve bölgelerin listesi bulunmaktadir:
• Afrika; • Orta Dogu, Asya ve Pasifik, excluding Avustralya, Israil, Yeni Zelanda, Oman, Katar ve Birlesik Arap Emirlikleri; • Meksika, Karayipler, Orta ve Güney Amerika; • Orta ve Dogu Avrupa: Arnavutluk, Ermenistan, Azerbaycan, Belarus, Bosna, Bulgaristan, Hirvatistan, Çek Cumhuriyeti, Estonya, Gürcistan, Macaristan, Kazakistan, Kirgizistan, Letonya, Litvanya, Makedonya, Karadag, Moldava Cumhuriyeti, Romanya, Rusya, Sirbistan, Slovakya, Slovenya, Tacikistan, Türkiye, Türkmenistan, Ukrayna, Özbekistan.
Dost ülke ücretli biletler transfer edilemez ve sadece sizin yerel elçiliginizde mevcuttur. Bu indirime sahip olmak için, elçinizin sizin ulusal ikametinize dair  kanita ihtiyaci olucaktir.

Özel fiyatli biletler sadece o ülkede ki elçilikten satin alinabilir. Online olarak alinamaz. Bu biletlerden satin alan kisilerin kapilarda pasaportunu sunmalari gerekir.

news\/boom-news\/sustainability-the-psyc.title: Sustainability, the Psychedelic Experience  And Shamanism
news\/boom-news\/sustainability-the-psyc.body:
Next August we will meet again to celebrate consciousness and dance around shamanic visions.  Again we will gather in ecstatic trance with our family. Together we will dance, communicate with the earth and transcend our attachments.   Our gathering comes from a deep sense of unity , running in the counter current of the neoliberal endeavour that is trying to objectify, commoditise and marketise all aspects of human life. We will rebirth the value of public good, social harmony, peace, awe and wonder from our daily living.

Shamanism is a calling, a calling from the Earth to the people in the four directions to strengthen their connection to Mother Earth. Living the oneness and caring for it is at the very center of being. Each and every person, animal,  plant or rock has something to teach us. Shamanism asks that we understand and create our reality, and calls for action. We must change.  Our behaviour towards Mother Earth is defining the reality we find ourselves in. It is time for the rebirth of compassion. Time to call upon all the wayfinders, the difference makers, the edgewalkers, the system thinkers and the change makers to lead by example.

If we are to build paradise, the transformational psychedelic experience, as manifestation of the individual and collective minds cannot coexist with bad behaviour. As Terence McKeena once said “there are no experts and there is only the integrity of doing and having done”. As we advance in the discovery of the new world inside our minds we must detach from the conditioning of the corporate version of reality and guide our actions for the paradise we are constructing. There is no waste. Only the resources we chose to pick up on our mindless moments, leaving behind unused symbols of our fall. Concepts like waste, entertainment, scarcity and fear must give way to mindfulness, spirit  and love.

Now is the moment to end one thousand years of materialism. We must recycle our toys into food producing receptacles. We must build habitat, as we call on the consciousness of Boomers to create paradise. We offer you the possibility to dissolve the boundaries that separate you from the universe and experience the sense of unity with the human family and nature. We have all the tools to build Idunn. Now Boomland ‘owns us’.

Boom Festival Sustainability goes beyond clean water and good food, solar energy and recycling of waste or ecological toilets. We will take care of that and we trust in the potential of your consciousness to extend our design process manifesting human destiny. Collectively we can and we will achieve more than progressive numbers on a chart. We can heal the Earth, and in the process of healing, find the freedom from control and cultural conditioning. Together we will throw away corporate materialism and rebirth harmony.

NOTE: The word shaman has its roots in Manchu-Tungu (a sub-family of the Altaic language family) šamán, an ancient term from the lands of the Tungus, the area around Lake Baikal in Southern Siberia, the original home of Indigenous peoples such as the Evenki. The Sanskrit word sramana (referring to a monk; ascetic) and the Chinese term scha-men (meaning to know; monk) bear the imprint of Tungus origins. Many cultures have in their traditions the equivalent of the shaman, and while some cultures still honor the shaman role that helps their community to heal when it is in trouble many others have lost this connection. 

With Love, Gratitude and Deep Respect

Boom Team

news\/boom-news\/line-up-announcements-y.title: Line Up Announcements? Yes, at Boom!
news\/boom-news\/line-up-announcements-y.body:
(Versão Portuguesa a Seguir ao Texto em Inglês)

Boom it is not an event based solely upon its musical line-up. There are no Headliners, no VIPs. Boom is a state of mind, an all encompassing spirit which is much more than a long list of DJs and live acts...

A sensory and psychedelic experience, Boom is a meeting, a coming together where in an open space we can submerge ourselves during the intimacy of the Full Moon, awakening our senses through sound, image, temporary architecture, arts, lectures, meditation and yoga activities. This collective energy supports and guides us to fresh beginnings and another way of Being.

Sound engages fully the human spirit and soul, and only music holds the key to this powerful well of energy which is fundamental for transformation. It is our collective mission at Boom to keep this unique energy flowing, bringing with it unity and diversity, change and awareness.

It is essential to not lose the essence of the psytrance scene. In this era of potentially toxic media, many art forms now suffer the negative impact of commercialization, especially few genres of electronic music. We enter a cult where the DJ is given greater importance than the collective experience of transcendence and unity.

In order to safeguard and value the collective experience of sound, we will not make any further announcements regarding line-up for the Boom Festival 2016 at this point.

In November 2015 we announced a few selective names as an offering of the quality and variety you will be able to experience at Boom 2016. The full program will be published on the Boom App from July 2016. If some of you don't have the App you can ask the Program via email to: info@boomfestival.org. 
Those of you who prefer to not use the App, you will be able to discover all the elements which make up Boom - the music, arts, and the conferences, along with our inspiring workshops program... once you arrive at Boom 2016!

With Love and Gratitude

Yours Boom Team


Versão Portuguesa

O Boom não é apenas um evento musical nem se baseia num line up - não temos cabeças de cartaz; é mais um estado de espírito do que uma lista de Djs ou live acts.

É uma experiência sensorial e psicadélica. Tudo aquilo que lá experienciamos através dos nossos sentidos (som, imagem, arquitectura temporária, artes, conferências, meditação ou yoga) activa uma sensação profunda que nos faz acordar um novo ser.

Sendo o som uma das energias mais poderosas sobre o Ser Humano, no Boom acreditamos que a música é um veículo nobre para a transformação. É nossa missão colectiva mantê-la como factor de unidade e diversidade, de mudança e consciencialização.

Nesta era de toxicidade mediática em que alguma música electrónica virou pop, é fundamental não se perder esta essência transformacional sob o risco da cena psytrance se transformar similar a outros estilos - onde existe o culto do DJ ao invés da experiência colectiva de transcendência e união.

É neste contexto, e com o objectivo de valorizarmos a experiência do som, que não iremos anunciar mais excertos do line up do Boom Festival 2016 por agora. Em Novembro de 2015 anunciámos já alguns artistas que expressam a variedade e qualidade do que irão encontrar, o restante programa será publicado a partir de Julho de 2016 via Boom App. Se não quiseres usar a App poderás pedir uma cópia do programa via email através de: info@boomfestival.org.
Ou alternativamente aguardar pela hora de chegada à Boomland e saber todo o programa de música, artes, conferências e workshops à entrada do Boom 2016!

Com Amor e Gratidão

A Vossa Boom Team

news\/boom-news\/end-of-application-form.title: End of Application Forms
news\/boom-news\/end-of-application-form.body:
[Versão Portuguesa em Baixo]

Dear Boomers!

Boom is a very real human manifestation which comes to life because of your diverse talent, creativity, fantasy and love. Every year we welcome the projects which you have submitted to us.

Long gone are the days when we received your CDs, DATs, books and photocopies filled with ideas. Ways of communicating have been transformed and nowadays your art comes to us via the website. However, we still love to receive your handwritten notebooks and drawings!
Not only does contemporary technology facilitate our communications with you, but each year we witness a growth in the number of people wishing to participate.

From November 2015 until February 29 2016, we received approximately 1509 applications for music, art installations and a further 166 artistic projects. Alongside these were an amazing array of diverse proposals; 421 workshops, 117 painters, 216 therapists, and 247 proposals from performers.

Throughout all the various editions we’ve always included projects which came from your  applications in the official Boom program. 

Our multi-disciplined team has without exception listen to all your musical and creative offerings in addition to reading your individual questionnaires in order to know each artist and the human being behind the artist better.
 
The Boom team responsible for selecting the music applications are themselves music professionals in different areas, musicians or DJs. Within the Arts team we have a dynamic array of visual artists and painters as well as art directors, and of course the same can be said for the Boom performance area with our creative team coming from the world of live performance and visual theatre, supported by seasoned professional artists and dancers. Our dedicated workshop team is made up of experienced practitioners, learned curators and specialised trainers all coming with years of practice and involvement in the areas of well being and healing.

We wish to thank you for your involvement and participation. Over the coming weeks we will continue to evaluate the applications with the same passion and dedication with which you have submitted your proposals.

It is nevertheless impossible to include everyone in the Boom 2016 program and those of you who are selected will be contacted soon or will have already been contacted. 
However, to all of you-the talented people that won’t be part of the final selection we wish to thank you for your passion and willingness of being part of the Boom Festival and we hope to see you in Boomland!
 
Thank you!
 
With Love and Gratitude
Yours Boom Team

[Versão Portuguesa]

Final das Candidaturas

Caros Boomers!
 
O Boom é uma manifestação humana que vem à vida com todo o vosso talento, criatividade, fantasia e amor. Anualmente abrimos o festival à vossa participação, aos projectos que nos enviam para que possam ser partilhados com os Boomers. Longe vão os tempos em que recebíamos caixas de CDs, DATs, livros e fotocópias com ideias; os tempos evoluem e actualmente a vossa arte chega até nós via website. Não apenas as tecnologias facilitam o nosso contacto, anualmente os números da vossa participação crescem!

Desde Novembro de 2015 até 29 de Fevereiro de 2016, recebemos cerca de 1509 candidaturas para música, 166 projetos de instalações artísticas, 421 propostas para workshops, 117 pintores, 216 terapeutas e 247 submissões para performances. 

Ao longo das várias edições incluímos sempre em todas as áreas do Boom projectos vindos das candidaturas. Para a celebração da Lua Cheia de 11 a 18 de Agosto de 2016, a nossa equipa multidisciplinar tem ouvido música, lido os vossos questionários para conhecermos melhor o ser humano para além da obra que é submetida na candidatura, sem excepção. 
As pessoas da Boom Team que fazem a selecção na música são músicos, DJs e elementos da produção ligados à música. Nas artes são artistas visuais, pintores, directores artísticos. Nas performances quem avalia são produtores de teatro, performers e dançarinos professsionais. E nos Workshops a nossa equipa de produtores, formadores, curadores de conhecimento, yoga e outras áreas de bem-estar dedicam uma grande atenção a tudo o que nos propõem.
 
Agradecemos-vos pelo envolvimento e participação, iremos continuar nas próximas semanas a avaliar tudo com a mesma dedicação com que nos submeteram as vossas propostas!

É impossível conseguirmos incluir todas as pessoas no programa do Boom 2016, quem for convidado será contactado; quem não puder fazer parte, agradecemos neste momento a vossa criatividade e vontade de fazer parte do Boom – esperamos ver-vos na Boomland!
 
Obrigado!
 
Com Amor e Gratidão
A Vossa Boom Team

news\/boom-news\/the-ecomodernists-optim.title: The Ecomodernist's Optimism
news\/boom-news\/the-ecomodernists-optim.body:
This video might be quite provocative for those of you who are part of the anti-nuclear movement. Michael Shellenberger is a so-called Ecomoderist. He's very aware of the serious environmental problems of our planet - but still he has a very optimistic view towards the future. Rather than lamenting the current situation, he suggests particular actions to face the environmental challenges of humanity - some of which are fairly radical for conservative left-wing activists.

"We didn't save the whales by using whales more sustainably, by using whale oil more efficiently. We saved the whales by using a different kind of energy, by using a substitute." This statement illustrates how Shellenberger is not an advocate of the classic "back to nature" approach. Enough said,  check it out yourself:

news\/boom-news\/the-natural-and-cultura.title: The Natural and Cultural Setting of Boom
news\/boom-news\/the-natural-and-cultura.body:
Boom wants to provide the ultimate setting for a transformational experience. To do so, it benefits greatly from its own setting: The surrounding region is extremely rich and diverse – both naturally and historically.

The unspoilt beauty of these surroundings is probably the most striking feature of this region. Its vast open skies, its smooth blend of earthy colours and its fragrance of pine trees, cork oaks, olive trees and wild roses create a vibe that is simply unique. Time is suddenly a very relative thing, it almost feels like a dinosaur might walk around the corner at any moment... Keep this in mind when you plan your trip to Boom, there's many amazing places to discover!

By the way: Just a few kilometres from Boom you might run into a cute little village that looks like it popped out of a fairytale. It's called Idanha-a-Velha, one of the oldest villages in Portugal. Just like Boom it's a melting pot of cultures: Founded by the Romans around 2000 years, this place was influenced by all the different people that passed through here shaped the history of Portugal, such as the Visigoths, the Moors and the Templar Knights, the Celt and the Iberians. As a matter of fact it seems as if this place has been an epicentre of multiculturalism for thousands of years already! If you happen to speak Portuguese, you'll get a lot of information in this little video – if you don't, you just get to see beautiful pictures.

news\/boom-news\/incorporate-permacultur.title: Incorporate Permaculture Into Your Life
news\/boom-news\/incorporate-permacultur.body:
Boom 2016 starts in less than 6 months. The future of our planet starts today, here and now – and it calls for your action. That's why we would like to share with you some inspirational words about permaculture and how you can actively use it in everyday life.

The basic principle of permaculture is as simple as it is beautiful: Adapt to the natural rhythms and circles of nature and use them for your own advantage, rather than ignoring these patterns and trying to achieve your goals at any cost. This well-written article suggests 4 Easy Ways to Incorporate Permaculture Into Your Life. Build around a 4-part mantra, it's easy-to-read, to-the-point, and highly compatible with everyday life.

   · Cultivate observation
   · Work with nature, not against it
   · Apply permaculture to your entire lifestyle
   · Remember that permaculture is a mindset

Ecology and Permaculture are also central topics at Boom's Liminal Village. A series of lectures, discussions and practical workshops will show you how small changes can make a big difference.

news\/boom-news\/acccessibility-and-fami.title: Practical Oneness at Boom
news\/boom-news\/acccessibility-and-fami.body: Earlier this week we published a little article about "The Art of Living at Boom" and shared with you some tips how to prepare your journey to and your stay at Boom. Especially those of us who travel with our families, with your baby boys and baby girls, want to know exactly what to expect. The same goes for those of us who have special needs because of a disability - we want to know about the facilities in Boom Land. The good news is: For almost 20 years we have been fine-tuning our infrastructure to make it both as family friendly and as accessible as possible. That's what we understand as a crucial factor for achieving Oneness. This webisode of the Boom 2014 documentary shows exactly how it turned out during the last edition.

news\/boom-news\/the-art-of-living-at-bo.title: The Art Of Living At Boom
news\/boom-news\/the-art-of-living-at-bo.body:
‘It's an utopian society... a global tribe meeting... a wormhole leading to a parallel universe.’ Statements like these have one thing in common: They imply that Boom is an experience very, very different from everyday life. That opens a huge realm of possibilities and inspiration. On the other hand, that means that you have to adapt to this new, utopian habitat. That’s why we came up with ‘The Art of Living at Boom – A Survival Guide for Boomers’, a booklet that provides you with essential information about how to plan your trip, what to keep in mind, and what to watch out for before, during and after Boom.

 

It starts with most basic of all factors: The natural environment. With people from more than 130 different countries attending, Boom is extremely international. While some might be used to the hot and dry summer climate of the Portuguese hinterland, others might experience it as a trip to an exotic planet. The Survival Guide for Boomers gives you tips how to enjoy a massive load of solar energy without getting fried.

 

‘Our freedom ends where the freedom of others begins’, as a popular saying goes. It touches upon a central issue of ethics that has been discussed by philosophers since ancient times. It's also a good summary for some basic rules you will find in ‘The Art of Living at Boom’, most of them concern the camping areas and car parks.


There's much more information: Special needs, children at Boom, communal kitchens, healthcare, where to go and what to do after Boom...

news\/boom-news\/parvati-records-discove.title: Behind The Scenes: Into Forest Psytrance
news\/boom-news\/parvati-records-discove.body:
If Trance is a state of mind, Psytrance music is one of the main roads leading to this state. From a raw dirt track it has evolved into a supersonic highway with a multitude of turnoffs and cross-sections that take you to places of alien beauty, timeless wisdom, and ultimately the realm of Oneness.

Parvarti Records has been doing a mayor job in paving the road to the state of Trance – especially that part of the road that leads through the mysterious Dark-ness of the Forest... In this episode of the Boom Broadcast we have a chat with label founder Guiseppe who talks about filling gaps, about milestone releases current hotspots of the scene.

news\/boom-news\/boom-broadcast-the-acti.title: Boom Broadcast: The Activists Behind The Scenes
news\/boom-news\/boom-broadcast-the-acti.body:
Boom is a carefully orchestrated, holistic experience designed to inspire positive change and evolution in many different ways. When you're in the middle of the dance floor, when you're participating a yoga session, or when you're just having a chat with your camping neighbours from the other side of the planet, you're ideally just there, right in that moment. This immersive experience is arguably the purest and best source of transformational energy.

But right now, one and a half years after the last Boom Festival and with still some months to go till the August full moon, you might ask yourself: Actually who is it that creates this experience? Who are those people who make this utopian world come true? Who are the The Activists Behind the Scenes? That's why we started a dedicated channel within the Boom Broadcast, a medium that provides you with information and inspiration by showing you the visions and efforts of those who keep the mighty cultural and spiritual energy of the scene flowing.

Become a part of this video channel yourself: The Boom Broadcast is an open stage for the global psychedelic community. Share your project and your visions, send your video to boombroadcast@boomfestival.org

news\/boom-news\/anthropocene-the-age-of.title: Anthropocene: The Age of Humans
news\/boom-news\/anthropocene-the-age-of.body:
This week kicked of with an environmental doomsday message. A popular British newspaper proclaimed: ‘Humans have made enough plastic since the second world war to coat the Earth entirely in clingfilm’. Unfortunately it's not even big news – the plastic problem is well-known since years already and has been the subject of countless articles and documentaries. Their message is crystal clear: This is really happening, and it's extremely serious.

 

However, Boom is not about doomsday messages. Being aware of a problem is the first step, of course. But then it should be about inspiration, about ideas for a future that is more in balance with nature than it is today. As a global gathering with more than 30.000 attendees we are facing the ecological challenges of a small town. It's not that Boom is free of these challenges – it's the way we approach them. With projects like our grey water treatment or our ‘Reuse – Recycle – Compost’ mantra we want to show the way to a bright future rather than a doomsday scenario.

 

That said, we want want to share with you today 'An Ecomodernist Manifesto'. It's a critical reflection on our current geological epoch: The so-called Anthropocene, the Age of Humans. The text shows how the massive influence of humankind on nature can go both ways – to the bright side or to the dark side. Available in a variety of languages.

news\/boom-news\/boom-broadcast-the-alte.title: Boom Broadcast: Alternative Models
news\/boom-news\/boom-broadcast-the-alte.body:
The ‘Alternative Models’ channel of the Boom Broadcast is dedicated to projects and people who make change happen on a daily basis. Be inspired!

Speaking of the seeds of change: There's that guy who introduces meditation to school kids from the age of 8, showing them how much pleasure and well-being it creates when you're in peace and balance with your inner self. In this way, this new generation might learn an interesting alternative to the world of restlessness, of materialist consumerism and Social Media narcissism we live in today. Another example: In the violence-ridden neighbourhoods of a South American metropolis there's a project that brings Yoga to the kids – a very efficient way to deal with the harsh reality of everyday life and the anger and aggression that come with it.


Become a part of this project yourself: The Boom Broadcast is an open stage for the global psychedelic community. Share your project and your visions, send your video to boombroadcast@boomfestival.org

news\/boom-news\/how-boom-can-be-life-ch.title: How Boom Can Be Life-Changing: An Example
news\/boom-news\/how-boom-can-be-life-ch.body:
For instance, there's many people out there how are suffering from chronic back pain. There's a good chance you're one of them. For these people, it would be a truly life-changing experience to find a way to get along with their troubles. Or, even better: To get rid of them altogether, to regain physical and mental freedom. Here's one example how Boom can be a life-changing experience. Welcome to the Being Fields.

 

Tui-Na. Abhyanga. Temazcali. To some of you this might sound like the names of exotic places or delicious dishes. But as a matter of fact we are talking about traditional forms of therapy and healing, about tried and tested ways to recalibrate the balance of your body and your mind, to clear the cache of your consciousness and to expand your horizons. The Being Fields, formerly known as Healing Area, are dedicated to exactly this kind of practice. Imagine you go home from Boom with not only epic party memories, but with a knowledge that can permanently upgrade your everyday quality of life - which again is the basis for you as an active part of society, as a catalysator for change. That's exactly what might happen when you spend some time on the Being Fields. If we want to make change happen, we have to start with the nucleus – with ourselves!


The Being Fields are not only a wonderful source of inspiration for those who are entirely new to this kind of physical and mental practice. Also those who are already familiar with it will find the extensive program highly interesting.

news\/boom-news\/artificial-intelligence.title: Smart Machines: Opportunity Or Danger?
news\/boom-news\/artificial-intelligence.body:
That's a fundamental truth when we talk about eco-awareness, sustainable lifestyles and respect towards Mother Nature in general. However, there's yet another aspect to this topic that is becoming more and more important: Artificial Intelligence.

Films like Ex Machina, Her and, of course, Terminator have introduced the opportunities and dangers that come with AI to a broad audience. As entertaining as these movies may be: At the core, they touch upon a development that is already happening. As Douglas Rushkoff wrote in his last book: 'The phones are smarter but we are dumber'. That's why Artificial Intelligence will be one of the topics at this year's Liminal Village.


The following video gives you a 15-minute introduction, pondering on the question: What happens when our computers get smarter then we?

news\/boom-news\/regeneration-of-the-boo.title: Boom's Vision is Growing... Quite Literally!
news\/boom-news\/regeneration-of-the-boo.body:
And we're not done yet: It's only been the first cut of the spade for the recent reforestation project here in Boomland. Altogether we will plant 550 new trees before the August full moon rises.

Planting trees is an extremely satisfying thing to do. It's great to work toward the next edition of the festival, with more and more creative minds getting involved every day. But planting trees is different, it goes deeper - even though it's much simpler. It's about being in direct, intimate contact with Mother Nature. It's about creating life, about starting new circles. There's an intense feeling of being connected to Earth, of being grounded. At the end of the day you got your hands dirty, you're tired, but you're super relaxed and satisfied. It's almost like meditation – try it yourself!

Of course it has some very beautiful side effects - for Mother Nature and for us, the Boomers. More trees create more shade. Their roots keep the Earth in place and prevent soil erosion. They create oxygen and are essential to life. They are somewhat essential for the use of hammocks or to give birds their house. And last but not least they add a lush dab of green to the visual appearance of Boomland. May all beings be happy with the new trees!

However, even when planting trees we have to keep in mind the balance of Mother Nature. We've all heard about invasive animal species that caused great harm for certain habitats of this planet. Just like that, there's also plants that are suitable for a particular environment and plants that are harmful for this environment. Our recent reforestation project is done under permission of the Portuguese Environment Agency and based on the observations of various botanists, permaculture activists, environmental engineers, and environmentalists, to make sure the new trees are 'good neighbours' for the natives, the ancient Iberian/Portuguese holmoaks ("quercus ilex", or "azinheira" in Portuguese). The species that we planted are:

· Acer Monspessulanum

· Acer Pseudoplatanus

· Alnus Glutinosa

· Betula Pubescena

· Castanea Sativa

· Celtis Australis

· Fraxinus Angustifolia

· Juglans Regia

· Laurus Nobilis

· Oea Europaea Sylvestris

· Populus Alba

· Populus Nigra

· Prunus Avium

· Quercus Pyrenaica

· Sorbus Latifolia

· Ulmus Minor

We like to refer to this conscious form of landscaping as intelligent eco design. The regeneration of the Boomland it's not exactly a new thing, as you might have noticed during earlier editions with the amount of new trees and gardens. For instance, you can read about the plant species and techniques we were using before the 2014 edition in this article.

To Sell Out, the online tickets, so far in advance means several things. It is synonymous of the trust that Boomers have towards their festival and its organization; the way Boomers are committed to improve and feedback the festival on a daily basis shows how important are the bonds between us both.

To achieve this result in just over a month is for us, Boom Team, a reason for enormous joy, but also gives us a lot of responsibility. We are joyful that you put all your trust in the work that this worldwide team has been doing. It means responsibility because we feel your great expectations, giving us motivation and energy to work every day for one more memorable edition.

As you know we decreased the number of tickets available for 2016 compared to 2014. What were the reasons? You, the amazing Boomers. Your comfort, your well-being, your space for dancing in the nature! It is for you that we work with selfless dedication, daily. We also believe that Boom and the Boomers can play a role on making a tangible difference in the world we live in, through a collective experience of arts, culture, music, dance, peace, respect for Mother Earth and Love. If a picture is worth a thousand words, dancing with likeminded people from all over the world, in a mind-blowing dance floor, without the rationalism or verbal communication, shows a new planetary culture. We are building it together at Boom. That is the Boom state of mind.

With Love and Gratitude
Boom Team

More information HERE

news\/boom-news\/boom-radio-tune-in-with.title: Boom Radio: Tune in with the Recent History of Boom
news\/boom-news\/boom-radio-tune-in-with.body:
Back in 2006, it all began as a pirate radio station. The Boom Radio broadcasted in FM, locally around the Boom site, synchronising Boomers with the lastest info from the Boom Festival edition. 2006 was known as the Bamboo edition, inspired by the temporary architecture that surrounded us - Bamboo buildings, Balinese style.

Straight after the 2006 edition we were obliged to shut the radio down and, comically (ironically?), we lost all of the files!

In 2008, the Boom Radio had less broadcasting power due to licensing but we managed to store and record so many nice moments including DJ sets and interviews, capturing what happened, as it happen, at Boom 2008. From here on, the role of Boom Radio transformed, archiving and recording what happened during all of the Boom editions: lectures, dj sets, live acts, interviews. 

In addition to recording memories and special moments, we developed two series of shows. In the psychedelic scene Boom was a pioneer on using its radio, inviting artists to record sets, and thus was born the Mindstream series. 

On the Road to Boom in 2014 we wanted to explore a new angle, the musical history of psychedelia with the project Kaleidoscopic Sounds. Krautrock, Jazz or Africa were some of the psychedelic strains of music we wanted to investigate and share with Boomers. 

The result was six episodes of enormous educational and musical value, an ode to the talent of many musicians who have sought to find new sounds, investigating the links between technology and emotional, mental, physical and body states.

Almost ten years have passed since the beginning of the Boom Radio, we invite you to celebrate the history of the Boom Festival through the invisible magic of Boom's Radio airwaves! 

Tune in to the Boom Radio HERE.

news\/boom-news\/humanist-technology-hac.title: Humanist Technology, Hacking & AI
news\/boom-news\/humanist-technology-hac.body:
We live in 2015/2016 under the effect of some of the great inventions of the 19th and 20th century - internal combustion engine, large-scale electricity, aircraft, automobile, telephone, television, computer, photovoltaic and wind power, internet - they all had a monumental impact on the planet but the human being has adapted to minimize their most negative impacts.

Today we do not have the certainty that the great inventions that are to emerge in the 21st century (many of which had their origins decades before) - artificial intelligence, robotics, nanotechnology, big data, 3D print, Internet of things - will have a lasting positive impact on the planet and the human being.

Join this day at the Liminal Village on a collective reflection and positive action towards how to integrate humanist, natural and spiritual values ​​on AI and technology.

More info HERE

Be free to submit your presentation for this day HERE

If you haven't received your eticket PDF yet, please write an email to etickets@boomfestival.org and attach your payment receipt. The process can take a while but your information is on a database, please don’t worry, you will get your ticket.

There are already Boomers from 100 countries confirmed at Boom Festival 2016, which embodies the planetary culture we are building together.

The capacity of Boom 2016 is limited to 33.333 people, there are less tickets available compared with 2014. To increase your comfort there will be more restaurants, toilets, showers and various other public services than in 2014.

Please always remember that the Boom experience is also an experience of harmony with the Earth: take care of your garbage, please use biodegradable products in the festival, respect the lake and the natural environment, and have an open mind.  

Psychedelic culture is about creating a new awareness, and this is what we will be doing together during the auspicious full moon of August 2016!

We know that currently the world is moving on a fast pace but enjoy your time reading the Boom website to know all information about 2016: www.boomfestival.org.

2nd Phase online tickets start now. We can’t wait to be at the Boomland with you next year!

Thank You For Your Love.

Boom Team

news\/boom-news\/our-new-video-channel-t.title: Our New Video Channel: Tune In Boom Broadcast
news\/boom-news\/our-new-video-channel-t.body:
The Boom Broadcast is a new video channel created by the Boom Fetsival to inform about psytrance and psychedelic culture as a whole. It features several videos independently produced by the Boom team and it is also a open source channel where everyone can submit their videos about psychedelic culture.

It is focused on several themes. On Alternative Models we look at some of the social, eco and spiritual projects that push mankind to the transition. On Activists Behind the Scenes we meet both artists in their studio or some teams that simply make things happen on the music and arts scenes. On Visual Arts we interview some artists that create visuals, graphic design, illustration, flyer art or video to expand the boundaries of the psychedelic axioms. On Psychedelic Science we're diving into the latest scientific findings or harm reduction projects that use the therapeutic use of psychedelia on legal contexts. Finally, on Psychedelic History we trace back the foundations of today's psy scenes across the world.

A larger number of people in the world today are somehow in contact with psychedelic culture than in any other moment in history. Not only the Psytrance scene became a worldwide phenomenon fueled by an exciting festival scene, it is also in several other music scenes (from Psych Rock to Bass Music), arts, design, web, sustainability, medicine, psychology or science that the culture has been expanding its effects.

Psychedelia is a culture and lifestyle with its own history, philosophy, art, visions, traditions, and message to the world. 

As far as Boom Festival goes, psychedelia for us is working towards a new consciousness. Education and sharing knowledge are roads to achieve it and this is why have been developing a new video project, the Boom Broadcast, to contribute to a more informed and resourceful scene.

The Boom Broadcast is dedicated to the paradigm-shifting potential of today's psychedelic scene. It's a medium to make change happen. Social projects, environmental education, reflections and background info on art, music and culture – those are just some ideas. An open stage for the psychedelic community and its creative, ecological, social and spiritual potential.

We Are One: Become a part of the Boom Broadcast yourself – submit your videos to boombroadcast@boomfestival.org

Tune in HERE

news\/boom-news\/why-shamanism-as-boom-2.title: Why Shamanism as Boom 2016 theme?
news\/boom-news\/why-shamanism-as-boom-2.body:
Across the world we awake to an interconnected cosmos where the wisdom of Sacred Plants is Medicine, where the drum beat induces ecstatic trance states in order to connect with the spiritual dimensions of reality for the welfare of a community, where we acknowledge the light and darkness as meaningful energies for evolution. It is the most ancient cartography to the invisible realms, when Man and Nature lived in tune, connected to the elements...

Through this arcane practice we discover how some of the most ancient forms of human art express the relationship of humans with their environment resulting from a vision quest to the under, inner and outer worlds.

We are celebrating the reverence of our ancestors to their surroundings and the eternal wonderment of the infinite realities of the cosmos, dear Boomers in 2016 the Boom theme is SHAMANISM!

More info HERE

news\/boom-news\/tickets-available-in-no.title: Tickets Available in November
news\/boom-news\/tickets-available-in-no.body:
Here's some essential information for anybody who wants to experience Boom 2016

One Scene, Different Economic Realities

We are one. However, we come from different local scenes and different economic realities. Income levels differ from country to country, sometimes greatly. That's why we see it as our responsibility to be flexible with the ticket pricing. There will be Regular Price tickets and so-called Friendly Price tickets, for countries that are facing a harsher situation in terms of income. Friendly Price tickets are available only at the ambassadors in those countries – Find more details and a full listing on this site.

3 Phases, 1 Ongoing Ticket Sale

There will be 3 different phases – but PLEASE KEEP IN MIND: Once the ticket sales have started, they won't stop until all 33.333 tickets for Boom 2016 have been sold. Phase 1 begins on 11th November 2015, and as soon as the total quota of this phase has been sold, we will immediately begin phase 2, and after that phase 3. There are 11.111 tickets per phase.

Please remember: There is a limited number of tickets per phase. If tickets are sold out before the date of the end of the phase, the following phase begins immediately.  

33.333 Tickets

If all tickets have been sold, there will be none at the gates of Boom Festival. To limit the number to 33.333 has been a hard decision, as it means some Boomers can't make it to the festival – but we believe that it is quality that matters, not quantity.

You Are Funding Boom, You Deserve Gratitude

If we break up the full price into a daily estimate, the average price for 1 day at Boom Festival would lie between 14 and 20 Euros, depending on the phase of the ticket sales. What you get is more than just a mind-blowing festival experience. You are funding a project that goes far beyond the scope of music and dance. You are funding a free cultural space that is the test ground for an alternative world. You are funding independency from corporations and brands. You are funding freedom. For this, you deserve eternal gratitude!

If you want to know exactly how the money from the ticket sales is spent, please check out this page.

news\/boom-news\/boomland-crowdfunding\/.title: Boomland Crowdfunding
news\/boom-news\/boomland-crowdfunding\/.body:
At Boom we create a Free Cultural Space. A testing ground for alternative lifestyles in unison with Mother Nature. For almost 20 years we have witnessed that it’s not a fantasy - it’s a reality.

However, we are facing a danger: Boom doesn’t own its land, and its lease ends in September 2016. In order to keep Boom alive, and to find support for a project at Boomland, January 2016 marks the start of a crowdfunding campaign. The aim is to gather the funds to acquire Boomland, and to do so we need to collect € 1 Million from various donors.

The time has come to take our reality to the next level: Let’s create a Permanent Free Culture Zone where our ideals for a new world such as freedom, peace, arts, environmentalism, free culture and love can be expressed on a daily basis while keeping Boom alive on the same location. We want to use the land to organize events for conscious lifestyles on a yearly basis, to develop permaculture projects for the reforestation of the land and for educational purposes.

We want to develop a spiritual hub and save this paradise for the international community known as Boomers.

Stay tuned here on our website. The campaign will be run on a donation basis from January 2016 onwards, and feel free to contact us at info@boomfestival.org.

Thank You!

news\/boom-news\/boom-eco-awards\/.title: Boom Eco Awards
news\/boom-news\/boom-eco-awards\/.body:
Boom Festival was once again nominated by a series of committees judging sustainability practices in large scale events and... for the 4th time in a row Boom won the OUTSTANDING Greener Festival Award!
 
The full recognitions are:

- OUTSTANDING GREENER FESTIVAL AWARD 2014, 2012, 2010, 2008: The winner of this category is a truly exceptional and inspirational event that has significantly reduced greenhouse gas emissions, has excellent travel, transport and waste management programmes, protects the environment and minimises the use of water, while clearly promoting and explaining these initiatives to the public. This award is monitored onsite by a group of juries.

- GREEN INSPIRATION AWARD 2012. The winner of this award has inspired the A Greener Festival team with cutting edge technologies for more sustainable events. Boom Festival won the award due to the on-site STAR waste water biological treatment and recycling system.

- EUROPEAN FESTIVAL AWARD - GREEN’N’CLEAN FESTIVAL of the YEAR 2010. Followed by Nomination for EUROPEAN FESTIVAL AWARD in the category Green Operations Award - European Festival Award for Green Excellence in 2012 and 2014.

Boom is an independent, no-sponsor festival that through sustainable practices, promotes the concrete possibility that another way to live in this world is possible.

Thank you Boomers for choosing Boom again and again! Your clear choice made these achievements possible and therefore these prizes are dedicated to each and every one of you!!

There's still a long way to go and we trust in your conscious behavior when participating at Boom Festival.

THANK YOU!
